name: 2016 ChocoBar Sample Set
description:
Free Shipping anywhere on Earth for any order with the Chocobar Sample Set, use coupon code: basics

The Chocobar Tasting set is a sample set that explores different tea types in a convenient and easy to brew chocolate bar brick shape. The tea types include:

  • Raw Puer Tea

  • Ripe Puer Tea

  • White Tea


Each tea brick is 100 grams. All material used in the bricks is from the Yunnan province of China. The set is an excellent comparison of processing methods for new tea drinkers, but the leaf used is all high quality, so even experienced drinkers can enjoy the Chocobars! They are ideal for tea on the go or as a small gift for a tea drinker.

Each set contains three bricks, totaling 300 grams of tea.
Each purchase is for a set of three different bricks: ripe Puer, raw Puer, and white tea. Each brick is 100 grams, the total amount of tea is 300 grams. Each brick was pressed by machine in 2016.

name: 2021 Yashka
description:
The 2021 Yashka is a blend of high quality raw Puer tea. Bold and upfront with underlying bitterness and an imposing strength of character without sacrificing elegance. Punchy when pushed, meaty thickness and plenty of room to mature, the bitter currents give way to a sweet wake that sticks in the mouth and throat.

Each cake is 200 grams.

Pressed in 2021. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2021 Yesheng Gushu Baicha
description:
Yesheng Gushu Baicha, literally translated as "wild ancient tree white tea", this tea comes from a wild varietal of tea leaf.

One of the most requested productions we have ever featured in any tea club, we were strong armed into producing this tea as a regular option, paying in early February this spring to secure the material.

A unique profile of bright wild vegetal flavors that drift between fresh cut cucumbers and a field of flowers in full bloom, simultaneously bitter and sweet. Whether or not those descriptions will fit your experience or not is anybody's guess. It is wildly difficult to pin this tea down and place into a box. Experience it for yourself.


Each cake is 200g. Cakes are packaged in tongs of five cakes.

name: 2021 Yesheng Gushu Hongcha
description:
Yesheng Gushu Hongcha, literally translated as "wild ancient tree red tea", this tea comes from a wild varietal of tea leaf.

After making appearances in our tea club, there were angry pitchfork carrying members at the gates demanding more of this wild tea. We took the remainder of the 2021 production and pressed it for the site.

A gnarly little tea with wild characteristics far outside the norm of what is considered a black tea, best to leave preconceptions at the door. Pungent aromas that drift between fruit and funk over a body of bitter-sweetness. Worth the price of admission as a unique tea experience.


Each cake is 200g. Cakes are packaged in tongs of five cakes.

name: 2021 Waffles
description:
Our classic Waffles blend. A shou Puer tea with a sweet, easily approachable character, pressed into a convenient waffle pattern that can be broken apart without the use of a tea needle. An excellent everyday ripe Puer tea, with a soft sweetness and a smooth warming body. A well balanced ripe Puer tea for beginners or veteran drinkers alike.

Each cake is 200 grams of tea.

name: 2021 Tiltshift
description:
Our 2021 Tiltshift is an extremely bud heavy picking of yueguangbai (also known as "moonlight white"), which is a shade dried white tea from Yunnan province.

This is a light and easy to drink white tea with a smooth body and sweet aftertaste. The aroma is soft and inviting, as is the tea. A perfect daily white tea for the morning.

Each cake is 200 grams, with 5 cakes per bamboo tong.

name: 2021 Tuhao
description:
The 2021 Tuhao is a blend of raw Puer material with character similar to Laobanzhang, without using any actual Laobanzhang material. Slightly heavier bitterness than in previous years, with a follow up of sweetness, the character is aggressive.

An excellent alternative to chasing the fame addled village, this tea is a bargain and better than the vast majority of teas mislabeled as Laobanzhang in the market.

Tuhao tea benefits from aging, but fans of strong tea will enjoy it straight away.

Each cake is 200 grams.

Pressed in 2021. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2021 Tiltshift Mini
description:
Our 2021 Tiltshift is an extremely bud heavy picking of yueguangbai, a shade dried white tea from Yunnan province. This is a light and easy to drink white tea with a smooth body and sweet aftertaste. The aroma is soft and inviting, as is the tea. A lovely daily drinker.

Each purchase is for one ~ 7 gram ball.

name: 2021 Sunskate
description:
A brand new black tea commission and the first time this tea was ever made by the farmer. Another lovely white2tea experiment gone right.

Sunskate was oxidized very lightly, so much so that we could probably refer to it as a strange oolong instead of a black tea. The goal was to leave room for further aging and oxidation in the coming years, but it's a beautiful tea fresh as well. Made from material usually destined for raw Puer production, Sunskate has a syrupy thick body with bright aromas uncommon in a black tea.

Pressed in 2021. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2021 Sunskate Mini
description:
A brand new black tea commission and the first time this tea was ever made by the farmer. Another lovely white2tea experiment gone right.

Sunskate was oxidized very lightly, so much so that we could probably refer to it as a strange oolong instead of a black tea. The goal was to leave room for further aging and oxidation in the coming years, but it's a beautiful tea fresh as well. Made from material usually destined for raw Puer production, Sunskate has a syrupy thick body with bright aromas uncommon in a black tea.


Each purchase is for one ~ 7 gram ball.

name: 2021 Sun Fu
description:
Anhua heicha fu zhuan, or fu brick, is a post fermented tea from Hunan province in China that contains "golden flowers" [eurotium cristatum].

After we fell in love with our 2018 sun fu, we commissioned a 2021 production from the very same producer.

A wonderful, well rounded fu brick. Thick and rich with plenty of feeling, but without being too overwhelming for the daily cup. Sweet and aromatic daily fu that can be aged further or drank right away.

Each brick is ~1000g of pressed tea.

Disclaimer: We've heard that people suffering from gluten allergies may be sensitive to Fu zhuan / eurotium cristatum. Best to avoid this tea if you are sensitive or have Celiac disease

name: 2021 Sugar Rush
description:
A remake of our sold out 2018 black tea.
Old arbor large leaf varietal tea that is usually destined to be made in raw Puer, picked and processed into shaihong style tea with sun drying.

Sugar Rush has a thick, rich sweetness and thick body. The development of flavor and fragrance over the course of a session is complex and engaging, with an underlying sweetness carrying throughout. This is an enduring and heavy black tea best suited for a longer, gongfu style tea session.

Pressed in 2021. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2021 Smokeshou
description:
We called our friends in Fujian in early spring and reserved pine wood for tea smoking, anxiously awaiting our space in line. Our Puer all blended in Yunnan, we shipped the blends to Fujian in summer. A veteran Lapsang smoker spent 3 days smoking our tea, smoking at temperatures from 100C to 120C in an old style Lapsang smokehouse in Tongmuguan village.

The unity of old school Fujian tea processing techniques with high quality base materials yields a totally unique smoke experience that pushes the tradition of smoked Puer tea in Yunnan (both the intentional and haphazard unintentional versions).

The pine smoke character is laced through the blend with an intense nose that will settle into the base of the tea with aging, eventually transforming into a rare combination of flavors and aromas that few Puer teas can mimic.

Obviously this tea is a natural fit for cigar lovers and Scotch whisky fanatics who want tea in the morning, but this tea is a surprise that will likely garner even fans who are wary of smoke.

Smokeshou is a blend of our own small batch shou Puer. A thick bodied tea with layers of bitterness and smoke over the rich and velvety shou mouthfeel. Perfect tea for cold weather or a rainy day.

Each cake is 200 grams of tea.

For aging, we recommend that smoked teas be sealed and separated from other teas, as the fresh smoke will pass along to the teas next to it. Or you can keep them with your cigars.

name: 2021 Snoozefest
description:
Snoozefest is a limited edition blend of tea that we would normally sell for over $40 per cake, however, we sell it for $15 for each 200 gram cake ($75 per 1kg tong).

No samples needed.

First come, first serve.

Drink now or age for the long haul.

Enjoy the tea.

;-)


Pressed in 2021. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2021 Smokeshou Mini
description:
We called our friends in Fujian in early spring and reserved pine wood for tea smoking, anxiously awaiting our space in line. Our Puer all blended in Yunnan, we shipped the blends to Fujian in summer. A veteran Lapsang smoker spent 3 days smoking our tea, smoking at temperatures from 100C to 120C in an old style Lapsang smokehouse in Tongmuguan village.

The unity of old school Fujian tea processing techniques with high quality base materials yields a totally unique smoke experience that pushes the tradition of smoked Puer tea in Yunnan (both the intentional and haphazard unintentional versions).

The pine smoke character is laced through the blend with an intense nose that will settle into the base of the tea with aging, eventually transforming into a rare combination of flavors and aromas that few Puer teas can mimic.

Smokeshou is a blend of our own small batch shou Puer. A thick bodied tea with layers of bitterness and smoke over the rich and velvety shou mouthfeel. Perfect tea for cold weather or a rainy day.

Each purchase is for one 7 gram mini.

For aging, we recommend that smoked teas be sealed and separated from other teas, as the fresh smoke will pass along to the teas next to it. Or you can keep them with your cigars.

name: 2021 Road 2 Nowhere
description:
A limited production pressed in 2021.

Complex and engaging raw Puer with a heavy body feel and thick, sweet soup.

Each cake is 200 grams.

Pressed in 2021. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are packed in tongs with five cakes per tong.

name: 2021 Raw Spring Liubao
description:
Liubao heicha, also known as dark tea, a post fermented tea from Guangxi province in China.

This tea was made on commission for white2tea in early spring of 2021 for our wonderful tea club. We did not have enough left for baskets, but had a little loose tea left for our new heicha section.

Not the typical mass produced and pile fermented dark liubao. Raw may be a misnomer, but calling it green doesn’t quite seem right either, and some folk have even suggested this tea qualify as a yellow tea or some hybrid unfermented heicha. In China people often call it nongjia or farmer style, though it is rarely sold on the open market due to small production sizes and lack of proper accreditation. You will find similarities in this tea that spans genres – green tea, yellow tea, heicha, raw Puer – there is a reason you can’t pin it down easily. 

Bright aromas and sweetness with a hefty ﻿huigan﻿ (returning sweetness) that is sticky and refreshing. Lovely to drink now or age as you desire.

Each purchase is for 25g of loose tea.

name: 2021 Reckless Daughter
description:
Our Reckless Daughter is a blend of several lightly fermented small batch shou Puer teas from the last few years.

This tea is meant to be aged, but veteran Puer drinkers won't flinch at the brisk sweetness and higher floral notes that blanket the unruly freshness of the pile and  the scant, darker traditional shou aspects of the tea. This tea drinks much like an aged sheng Puer, rather than a traditional shou, and will continue to progress in that direction over the coming years, retaining a strong huigan (returning sweetness in the mouth) and strong feel.

Each cake is 200 grams of tea.

name: 2021 Raw Autumn Liubao
description:
Liubao heicha, also known as dark tea, a post fermented tea from Guangxi province in China.

This tea was made on commission for white2tea in autumn of 2021.

Not the typical mass produced and pile fermented dark liubao. Raw may be a misnomer, but calling it green doesn’t quite seem right either, and some folk have even suggested this tea qualify as a yellow tea or some hybrid unfermented heicha. In China people often call it nongjia or farmer style, though it is rarely sold on the open market due to small production sizes and lack of proper accreditation. You will find similarities in this tea that spans genres – green tea, yellow tea, heicha, raw Puer – there is a reason you can’t pin it down easily. 

Lively aromas with a sticky sweetness and refreshing taste. Lovely to drink now or age as you desire.

Each basket contains ~250g of tea.

name: 2021 Pyrolad
description:
We called our friends in Fujian in early spring and reserved pine wood for tea smoking, anxiously awaiting our space in line. Our Puer all blended in Yunnan, we shipped the blends to Fujian in summer. A veteran Lapsang smoker spent 3 days smoking our tea, smoking at temperatures from 100C to 120C in an old style Lapsang smokehouse in Tongmuguan village.

The unity of old school Fujian tea processing techniques with high quality base materials yields a totally unique smoke experience that pushes the tradition of smoked Puer tea in Yunnan (both the intentional and haphazard unintentional versions).

The pine smoke character is laced through the blend with an intense nose that will settle into the base of the tea with aging, eventually transforming into a rare combination of flavors and aromas that few Puer teas can mimic.

As for the tea blend, you can imagine that we wouldn't phone-in a blend that requires so much planning and legwork to process, suffice it to say it's fantastic. Burly, full bodied, deep returning sweetness, layered nuance and heavy feel.

Obviously this tea is a natural fit for cigar lovers and Scotch whisky fanatics who want tea in the morning, but this tea is a surprise that will likely garner even fans who are wary of smoke.


Each cake is 200 grams.

Pressed in 2020. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

For aging, we recommend that smoked teas be sealed and separated from other teas, as the fresh smoke will pass along to the teas next to it. Or you can keep them with your cigars.

name: 2021 Pyrolad Minis
description:
We called our friends in Fujian in early spring and reserved pine wood for tea smoking, anxiously awaiting our space in line. Our Puer all blended and ready in Yunnan, we shipped the blends to Fujian in summer. A veteran Lapsang smoker spent 3 days smoking our tea, smoking at temperatures from 100C to 120C in an old style Lapsang smokehouse in Tongmuguan village.

The unity of old school Fujian tea processing techniques with high quality base materials yields a totally unique smoke experience that pushes the tradition of smoked Puer tea in Yunnan (both the recent intentional and haphazard unintentional versions).

The pine smoke character is laced through the blend with an intense nose that will settle into the base of the tea with aging, eventually transforming into a rare combination of flavors and aromas that few Puer teas can mimic.

As for the tea blend, you can imagine that we wouldn't phone-in a blend that requires so much planning and legwork to process, suffice it to say it's fantastic. Burly, full bodied, deep returning sweetness, layered nuance and heavy feel.

Obviously this tea is a natural fit for cigar lovers and Scotch whisky fanatics who want tea in the morning, but this tea is a surprise that will likely garner even fans who are wary of smoke as well.

This is the mini version and each mini is ~7g.

For aging, we recommend that smoked teas be sealed and separated from other teas, as the fresh smoke will pass along to the teas next to it. Or you can keep them with your cigars.

name: 2021 Pretty Girls Mini
description:
The Pretty Girls shou Puer blend has a beautiful aroma. If one were to try and place it in a broad category in might be a pulling a hot tray of freshly baked cherry danishes from a wood-fired oven type, but we will leave that up to you. Pretty Girls quickly proceeds into sweet shou territory after the rinse. The velvety texture of the soup and complex flavors develop over the coming steeps and eventually settle into a soft sweet profile that can be infused over and over. Drink immediately or age as your prefer.

 

Each purchase is for one 7 gram mini.

name: 2021 Philtre
description:
Every spring I try to flex my blending skills by making at least one raw Puer tea blend that defies its price tag, spitting in the face of all of my expensive teas. This year that's the Philtre. Sticky long lasting huigan [returning sweetness] with bright aromas and powerful flavor, all with a price tag well worth buying a tong of. Drink now or age as you please.

Each cake is 200 grams.

Pressed in 2020. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2021 Philtre Minis
description:
The mini version of our 2021 Philtre blend.

Every spring I try to flex my blending skills by making at least one raw Puer tea blend that defies its price tag, spitting in the face of all of my expensive teas. This year that's the Philtre. Sticky long lasting huigan [returning sweetness] with bright aromas and powerful flavor, all with a price tag well worth buying a tong of. Drink now or age as you please.

Each mini is ~7 grams. Each stack contains 7 minis.

Pressed in 2021.

name: 2021 Patti
description:
Our 2021 Patti is a sun dried white tea made from camellia sinensis assamica (large leaf varietal) leaves from old trees, usually destined for raw Puer production.

The tea is brothy with a heavy umami base and intense feeling surrounding the sweet clarity of the classic Yunnan white tea style.


Each cake is 200 grams, with 5 cakes per bamboo tong.

name: 2021 Patti Mini
description:
Our 2021 Patti is a sun dried white tea made from camellia sinensis assamica (large leaf varietal) leaves from old trees, usually destined for raw Puer production.

The tea is brothy with a heavy umami base and intense feeling surrounding the sweet clarity of the classic Yunnan white tea style.

Each purchase is for one ~ 7 gram ball.

name: 2021 Moon Waffles
description:
The return of our lauded bud heavy, shade dried Yunnan white tea.

A bright and floral fresh white tea with a supple sweetness and creamy, heavy body. Delicious tea at a great price.

Cakes are pressed into a tight waffle shape that can be easily broken apart without a pick or tea needle.

Each cake is 200g.

name: 2021 Lumber Slut
description:
Lumber Slut was pressed in 2021. The return of our heralded woody blend from 2017.

Blended to favor the dense flavors of petrichor and wood, this style of ripe Puer is focused on unfolding as an experience with notes of camphor and lower umber toned tastes. Will benefit from further aging, but if you're down for what this tea is offering, we suspect you can drink it straight away without flinching.

Each cake is 200 grams of tea.

name: 2021 Lucky Puppy
description:
The return of our classic blend.

The 2021 Lucky Puppy blend involves a wide range of high end material from several regions. The unique character of this tea is heavy with strength and depth. Lucky Puppy evolves from steep to steep in a gongfu brewing session, displaying a wide array of characteristics and a unique experience. The tea has a powerful aggressive character in earlier steeps, with a lasting huigan and complex returning flavors in the mouth. The later steeps trail off into a smooth, sweet sunset.

Drink now or age for the longer term.

Each cake is 200 grams.

Pressed in 2021. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2021 Liu'An Tegong
description:
Liu'An heicha, also known as dark tea, a post fermented tea from Anhui province in China.

Tegong Liuan made on commission for white2tea in spring of 2021 from the best material we could obtain. Often sold in China as "wild" tea, but we decided to call it Tegong instead.

Dense with fragrance from the initial rinse and full with aroma and flavor throughout the entire session, the complex sweetness and funk linger in the mouth and throat long after the tea is gone. A unique treat for heicha lovers.

Made to age, but enjoyable straight away.

Baskets contain ~250g of loosely pressed tea.

name: 2021 Liu'An Gongjian
description:
Liu'An heicha, also known as dark tea, a post fermented tea from Anhui province in China.

Our Gongjian Liuan was a commission for white2tea from spring of 2021. Bitey and spicy intense tea that comes out punching. Heavy sweetness and bursting aromas to light up your morning.

Made to age, but those enjoy an intense cup will enjoy it straight away.

Baskets contain ~250g of loosely pressed tea.

name: 2021 Lesser Evils
description:
Lesser Evils is a blend of our small batch shou Puer.

Densely layered with an inky depth and soothing body. The softer aromas will settle into a bouquet of sweet aroma. Complex and engaging flavor that won't break the budget. Far and away the best quality and value combination in our 2021 shou Puer lineup.

Each cake is 200 grams of tea.

name: 2021 Lesser Evils Minis
description:
Lesser Evils is a blend of our small batch shou Puer.

Densely layered with an inky depth and soothing body. The softer aromas will settle into a bouquet of sweet aroma. Complex and engaging flavor that won't break the budget. Far and away the best quality and value combination in our 2021 shou Puer lineup.

Each mini is ~7g.

name: 2021 Judy Mini
description:
Our 2021 Judy is a sun dried Yunnan white tea made from camellia sinensis assamica (large leaf varietal) leaves from old trees, usually destined for raw Puer production.

A thick and complex white tea, with layered fragrances and sweetness throughout; poets grab your pens, there are more than a few outlandish descriptions lurking in the flavors of this tea. Engaging from start to finish during a gongfu session, with enough power to entice dedicated raw Puer lovers.

Each purchase is for one ~ 7 gram ball.

name: 2021 Judy
description:
Our 2021 Judy is a sun dried Yunnan white tea made from camellia sinensis assamica (large leaf varietal) leaves from old trees, usually destined for raw Puer production.

A thick and complex white tea, with layered fragrances and sweetness throughout; poets grab your pens, there are more than a few outlandish descriptions lurking in the flavors of this tea. Engaging from start to finish during a gongfu session, with enough power to entice dedicated raw Puer lovers.


Each cake is 200 grams, with 5 cakes per bamboo tong.

name: 2021 is a gift
description:
2021 is a gift is a small production of difficult to acquire material that rarely sees the light of day in the larger market.

Succulent soothing broth. The soup is densely layered and calming with a unique fragrance that penetrates the liquor and lingers in the mouth and throat. A strong and engaging tea for special occasions.

Each cake is 200 grams.

Pressed in 2021. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2021 Hotline Space Coyote
description:
The 2021 Hotline Space Coyote, the return of our classic, strong Menghai area character. Full on power with a smokey backdrop. Medium bitterness and astringency when pushed and a heavy bodied tea throughout. Intensity fiends can drink it straight away, the faint of heart might prefer to age it a bit.

Each cake is 200 grams.

Pressed in 2021. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2021 Hot Brandy
description:
The soup is thick, smooth, and fragrant. It fares well with both gongfu style and western style brewing. The tea has excellent endurance and can steep for a very long time and can even withstand being simmered or boiled without becoming acrid.

Both the white tea and black tea have been sun dried and should age well together. However, we are only two three years deep on this experiment; though the results are promising, how it will age in the long term is anybody's guess.


Hot Brandy is a mix of both white tea and black tea. 200g cake pressed in 2021. Each bamboo tong contains 5 cakes.

name: 2021 Hokum
description:
Hokum is a blend of our small batch shou Puer. A smooth and easy shou Puer tea with light sweetness and fruity notes blended with wood. No fuss, easy on the wallet. A great entry point for people who want to dip a toe in the shou Puer pool.

 

Each cake is 200 grams of tea.

name: 2021 Green Hype
description:
The latest installment in the Green Hype saga. A significant amount of aged material in the blend to smooth out the experience. The new material in the blend is punchy and full bodied with an intense huigan [the lingering sweetness in the mouth after drinking a tea]. Excellent daily drinking raw Puer with plenty of intrigue and character to keep you engaged from cup to cup.

Each cake is 200 grams. Tongs are 5 cakes wrapped in bamboo.

name: 2021 Hokum Minis
description:
Hokum is a blend of our small batch shou Puer. A smooth and easy shou Puer tea with light sweetness and fruity notes blended with wood. No fuss, easy on the wallet. A great entry point for people who want to dip a toe in the shou Puer pool.

Each mini is ~7g.

name: 2021 Gas
description:
The 2021 Gas is a raw Puer blend focused on mind bending bitterness. Fans of in your face bitter character will be happy to steep this tea in any style, though most people will not be able to handle anything but gongfu style flash steeps, especially while this tea retains its youthful vigor. You'll understand why it's named Gas around steep 5.

Pressed in 2021. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2021 Fox Down
description:
The return of our 2020 hit Yunnan shai hong, sun dried black tea made from a bud heavy picking. 

Fox Down is a thick and malty black tea with a full bodied texture and supple sweetness. It brews well with any style, whether you are using a deft touch with gongfu brewing or tossing into your hot water bottle to take out into the world. A truly wonderful daily black tea.

Pressed in 2021. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2021 Coyote Minis
description:
The 2021 Coyote Minis are the tiny version of our Hotline Space Coyote blend. Convenient, portable, and full of strong Menghai area character. Full on power with a smokey backdrop. Medium bitterness and astringency when pushed and a heavy bodied tea throughout. Intensity fiends can drink it straight away, the faint of heart might prefer to age it a bit.

Each mini is ~7g.

name: 2021 Camphornought
description:
Our 2021 Camphornought is a wallop of woody flavors and low toned aromas in a thick bodied, smooth tea. There is a slight touch of bitterness inside the burly forest of flavors and even a light faded smoke in the backdrop. If you're the type who enjoys whisky or a pipe on the porch, Camphornought is the shou Puer version of that.

Each cake is 200 grams of tea.

name: 2021 Diao Retro
description:
The 2021 Diao Retro is an intense, experimental blend that pushes the envelope of disparate materials working together. The overall strength is apparent from the outset with softer characteristics flitting around the edges of the experience. Full of flavor, aroma and feeling. Not sure if it is harmony or chaos, time will tell.

Each cake is 200 grams.


Pressed in 2021. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2021 Builders
description:
A remake of our sold out 2019 bamboo black. A hand roasted bamboo black tea, the 2021 Builders is a perfect balance of working class utility and artisan tea snobbery. It is our white2tea twist on the classic concept strong style of "builder's tea" from the UK. This bud heavy whole leaf Yunnan sun dried tea was mercilessly crammed into bamboo and hand roasted over an open flame.

The result is a shard heavy tea with many of broken bits and plenty of surface area which cause the tea to steep out very quickly making a very potent brew for an afternoon pick me up or a morning eye opener. This tea is very versatile with a heavy aroma of fragrant bamboo, malt and honey; not to mention a booming lingering aftertaste. Steep in gongfu style like a bamboo loving connoisseur or western style topped off with cream like you have a job to do.

The mash up of style and function makes this unique tea a common morning cup in the white2tea house.

Each piece of bamboo was pressed with 200 grams of tea.

name: 2021 Beebe
description:
Our 2021 Beebe is a sun dried white tea from Yunnan, made from camellia sinensis assamica (large leaf varietal) leaves from old trees, usually destined for raw Puer production.

A white tea with rich candy sweetness, bright clarity in the mouth and sugar cane aromas locked in the soup that linger long after the tea is gone.


Each cake is 200 grams, with 5 cakes per bamboo tong.

name: 2021 Bosch
description:
The return of our classic blend for the old heads. A blend of raw Puer material from multiple areas. Strong. Not the best place to start for inexperienced Puer tea drinkers.

Each cake is 200 grams.

Pressed in 2020. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2021 Bringer
description:
Our Bringer blend marries several high end small batch shou Puer teas of varied fermentation levels.

Most of the shou Puer in this blend is from material qualities that very few people ever dare to ferment, much less blend. The result is a thick, rich and complex orchestra that evolves from steep to steep, rolling into the session like a cup of melted 90% dark chocolate and gliding through to the later steeps which resemble a well-aged raw Puer tea.

Even freshly pressed, this tea is lovely. The prospect of further aging presses the limits of our patience.

Each cake is 200 grams of tea.

name: 2021 Beebe Mini
description:
Our 2021 Beebe is a sun dried white tea from Yunnan, made from camellia sinensis assamica (large leaf varietal) leaves from old trees, usually destined for raw Puer production.

A white tea with rich candy sweetness, bright clarity in the mouth and sugar cane aromas locked in the soup that linger long after the tea is gone.

Each purchase is for one ~ 7 gram ball.

The 2021 680 is a soft and succulent raw Puer blend. Airy cotton candy dancing on high pitched aromas and stone fruits with a mineral sweetness. When pushed, it moves into overwhelmingly saccharine territory. With a light hand, it's a gently sweet breeze.

Each cake is 200 grams.

Pressed in 2021. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2021 Anhua Tianjian
description:
Anhua heicha, also known as dark tea, a post fermented tea from Hunan province in China.

Tianjian is a high grade production of Anhua heicha that contains younger leaves and buds. This production was made on commission for white2tea in 2021.

Lively tea with high pitched notes of tobacco and spice poured over a syrupy sweet intensity that it excellent for a fresh daily heicha lover, or to be aged as a basket full of treasure for the future.

Bamboo baskets contain ~500g of loosely pressed tea.

name: 2020 Zero Sum
description:
Multiple provinces. Young tea and aged tea. Plenty of old arbor.

This is an experimental, one-time white tea blend that I couldn't recreate if I tried. The confluence of several uncommon teas spinning together in a heady tornado. The fragrances and flavors are far out there. Notes of cream and aged tobacco with a very strong full bodied tea. Best enjoyed with gongfu tea and built to age further, though it's delicious right now.

Pressed in 2020. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2021 1 Absolution
description:
An intense blend of raw Puer tea from a few very small productions of what we consider to be rare and beautiful teas. Bright, hypnotic aromas and a sugary body with an elegant character that belies a ferocious intensity of depth and feeling.

Each cake is 200 grams.

Pressed in 2021. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2020 Unicorn
description:
The return of the sold out 2019 Unicorn. This just missed the release with our other 2020 Spring teas, so we are releasing it later than usual.

This tea is more of a personal production; a few kilograms of scraped together astronomically priced Yiwu. I wouldn't really recommend this tea for people who are new to drinking raw Puer. (under several years or so) The reasons this tea is phenomenal are not "slap in the face obvious", but it is unbelievably comforting to drink, like sweet silk covering your throat and stomach. Drink this tea if you are deep into Yiwu and have the budget, otherwise pretend you never saw this and buy the 2020 inb4 instead. It is a much better value and also a very high end Yiwu raw Puer.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2020 Waffles
description:
Our classic Waffles blend. A shou Puer tea with a sweet, easily approachable character, pressed into a convenient waffle pattern that can be broken apart without the use of a tea needle. An excellent everyday ripe Puer tea, with a soft sweetness and a smooth warming body. A well balanced ripe Puer tea for beginners or veteran drinkers alike.

Each cake is 200 grams of tea.

name: 2020 Turtle Dove
description:
The 2020 Turtle Dove is a pressed white tea from Yunnan. Made from large leaf varietal material that is sun dried with no machine processing involved.

Our classic white tea has a thick body, soft mouthfeel, and a unique natural fragrance. Sweet and succulent with plenty of endurance for re-steeping. This tea is very forgiving with any type of brewing, including gongfu, western, or grandpa style. A perfect white tea to drink daily without much fuss.

Each cake is 200g.

name: 2020 Umbrella
description:
Tea made for a rainy day. Pressed from our own stash of aged maocha, this tea was stored tightly sealed in Menghai since 2015 and pressed a few days ago in Menghai. The aroma is excellent. Thick and sweet soup. Really nice tea.

We have intentionally marked this tea far, far below its proper price in an attempt to send out a bit of positivity during this time. Hope you are all staying safe in the storm.

Each cake is 200 grams. These cakes were just pressed and are not in tongs. Please limit yourself to five cakes or less so that more people have a shot at buying a cake.

name: 2020 Tiltshift
description:
Our 2020 Tiltshift is an extremely bud heavy picking of yueguangbai (also known as "moonlight white"), which is a shade dried white tea from Yunnan province.

This is a light and easy to drink white tea with a smooth body and sweet aftertaste. The aroma is soft and inviting, as is the tea. A perfect daily white tea for the morning.

Each cake is 200 grams, with 5 cakes per bamboo tong.

name: 2020 Tiltshift Mini
description:
Our 2020 Tiltshift is an extremely bud heavy picking of yueguangbai, which is a shade dried white tea from Yunnan province. This is a light and easy to drink white tea with a smooth body and sweet aftertaste. The aroma is soft and inviting, as is the tea. A lovely daily drinker.

Each purchase is for one ~ 7 gram ball.

name: 2021 The Thing Is
description:
The 2021 the thing is was a long time production for our tea club that has made it's way into the 200g cake big leagues. A succulent and engaging sheng Puer tea with a thick satin body and gripping sweetness. Delicious to drink now or age it down the honey laden trail for years to come.

Each cake is 200 grams.

Pressed in 2021. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2020 The Stranger
description:
Our 2020 The Stranger blend is a small batch shu Puer blend that is built to age. A blend of several high end small batch materials which lean towards lighter fermentation and will perform similarly to aged raw Puer tea when these teas age and settle. The returning sweetness lingers in the mouth while this full bodied tea evolves from steep to steep.

While many will enjoy this tea right away, it will really begin to shine in 2022 and beyond.

Each cake is 200 grams of tea.

name: 2020 Supteaheads
description:
A limited edition tea pressed in 2020 using a blend of aged material.

Abundant and complex flavors and aromas with a thick bodied soup and a long lasting huigan (returning sweetness in the mouth). A blend of a couple of teas with a little bit of age on them that come together in a forceful medley. Great for drinking straight away or aging as you see fit.

(No Tunji this year. The material wasn't up to our standards, so we made this blend of a few stockpiled favorites instead)

The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2020 The Nameless One
description:
Our 2020 The Nameless One is an entirely small batch shu Puer blend that pushes the boundaries of shu Puer tea.

Most people don't bother fermenting high end material themselves to make shu Puer tea. Even fewer people yet bother taking high end raw Puer and fermenting at very light levels which are riskier and more difficult to control. Even fewer people than that make multiple small batches of high end, deftly fermented materials and then blend them together.

Lucky for you, we are not most people.

The Nameless One blends several high end materials from several regions at several different levels of fermentation. The result is syrupy thickness, mouth watering huigan, and a complex and engaging steep to steep experience that will make you question the genre. This tea was blended to age, but it's entrancing now.

This is the culmination of five years of intense observation of the pile fermenting process in Menghai. If you're a fan of our teas, do not skip this. I'd recommend a tong for ten years from now.

Each cake is 200 grams of tea.

name: 2020 Sunday Special
description:
Our 2020 Sunday Special is an entirely small batch shu Puer version of our classic blend.

Combining several regions of Puer tea for a full bodied, silky mouthfeel. The sweetness is complex and the flavor profile robust and enjoyable. Best when steeped on Sunday.

Each cake is 200 grams of tea.

name: 2020 Snoozefest
description:
Snoozefest is a limited edition blend of tea that we would normally sell for over $40 per cake, however, we sell it for $15 for each 200 gram cake ($75 per 1kg tong).

No samples needed.

First come, first serve.

Drink now or age for the long haul.

Enjoy the tea.

;-)


Pressed in 2020. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2020 Saturday Mass Mini
description:
Our Saturday Mass is a blend of our small batch shu Puer and chenpi (Mandarin orange skin). Each mini is roughly 7 grams, with 7 minis in each stack.

This blend focuses on the thicker, heavy aspects of shu Puer and an aged orange skin that offers a darker medicinal citrus aroma. The tea has a thick texture with a smooth, heavy body and dark flavor profile. Perfect tea for cold or wet weather. Drink now or age as you please.

When choosing size options, you can either choose a full stack or an individual mini.

name: 2020 Sentinel
description:
The 2020 Sentinel is made from old arbor large leaf varietal tea that is typically made into raw Puer. This tea was picked and processed into shaihong [sun dried black tea] style tea with no machine processing.

Sentinel is a full bodied black tea with a honey sweetness and fruity, floral aroma. Even keel thick sweetness lasts throughout the session along with evolving complex fragrances. A delightful tea for a focused gongfu session.

Pressed in 2020. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2020 Saturday Mass
description:
Our Saturday Mass is a blend of our small batch shu Puer and chenpi (Mandarin orange skin).

This blend focuses on the thicker, heavy aspects of shu Puer and an aged orange skin that offers a darker medicinal citrus aroma. The tea has a thick texture with a smooth, heavy body and dark flavor profile. Perfect tea for cold or wet weather. Drink now or age as you please.

Each cake is 200 grams of tea.

name: 2020 Road 2 Nowhere
description:
A limited production of 50 cakes pressed in 2020.

Complex and engaging raw Puer with a heavy body feel and thick, sweet soup.

Each cake is 200 grams.

Pressed in 2020. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are packed in tongs with five cakes per tong.

name: 2020 Prosbloom
description:
Our 2020 Prosbloom blend is a sweet and supple shou Puerh tea for the everyday. A very versatile tea that excels in gongfu style or grandpa style brewing. The kind of tea you reach for over and over when deciding what to drink is too complicated and you need a smooth, reliable cup.

Each cake is 200 grams of tea.

name: 2020 Pretty Girls
description:
Tea club members, there is a sample of this in the December tea club!

The 2020 Pretty Girls Ripe Puer Tea is the return of our sold out 2018 blend.

The blend has a beautiful aroma. If one were to try and place it in a broad category in might be a pulling a hot tray of freshly baked cherry danishes from a wood-fired oven type, but we will leave that up to you. Pretty Girls quickly proceeds into sweet shou territory after the rinse. The velvety texture of the soup and complex flavors develop over the coming steeps and eventually settle into a soft sweet profile that can be infused over and over. Drink immediately or age as your prefer.


Each biscuit is 12 grams and can easily be snapped into two 6g sessions. Stacks are of 10 biscuits and roughly ~120g total.

name: 2020 Prosbloom Mini
description:
Our 2020 Prosbloom blend is a sweet and supple shou Puerh tea for the everyday. A very versatile tea that excels in gongfu style or grandpa style brewing. The kind of tea you reach for over and over when deciding what to drink is too complicated and you need a smooth, reliable cup.

Each purchase is for one 7 gram mini.

name: 2020 Planetary Shark Feed
description:
Our 2020 Planetary Shark Feed blend is a good balance of quality material while still being friendly to your bank account. This shu Puer blend boasts a berry sweetness and a smooth body with fleeting aromas of sandalwood. Excellent for a daily drinker.

Each cake is 200 grams of tea.

name: 2020 Planetary Shark Feed Mini
description:
Our 2020 Planetary Shark Feed blend is a good balance of quality material while still being friendly to your bank account. This shu Puer blend boasts a berry sweetness and a smooth body with fleeting aromas of sandalwood. Excellent for a daily drinker.


Each purchase is for one 7 gram mini.

name: 2020 Old Reliable
description:
Our 2020 Old Reliable is an entirely small batch shu Puer version of our classic house blend. It's our best balance of high quality small batch material and affordability.

The white2tea house blend and the gateway to understanding our small batch shou skills.

A carefully blended and well balanced shu Puer that incorporates material from five different small batches spanning four years. Engaging and complex flavor, aroma and sweetness with a thick presence. An all around crowd-pleaser of a tea with a price tag that defies logic. Drink now or age, you won't find a better quality/value ratio.

Each cake is 200 grams of tea, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2020 Nightlife
description:
Nightlife is a bud heavy, high grade production of yueguangbai [moonlight white] style tea, commissioned from large leaf varietal material usually destined for raw Puer tea.

The tea has a heavy, creamy mouth feel with an airy sweetness and aroma. An enduring white tea with distinct character.


Pressed in 2020.

name: 2020 Nightlife Mini
description:
Nightlife is a bud heavy, high grade production of yueguangbai [moonlight white] style tea, commissioned from large leaf varietal material usually destined for raw Puer tea.

The tea has a heavy, creamy mouth feel with an airy sweetness and aroma. An enduring white tea with distinct character.


Pressed in 2020.


Each mini sphere is 7 grams, each purchase is for one mini.

name: 2020 Mud
description:
The 2020 Mud. Rich savory complexity with a smooth, filling body and ﻿huigan﻿ [ lingering returning sweetness in the mouth]. A thick and enduring presence that remains long after the tea has left your cup.

Each cake is 200 grams.

Pressed in 2020. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2020 Natural Redhead
description:
The 2020 spring edition of our classic Yunnan black tea.

Made from large leaf varietal material, the tea is sun dried with no machine roasting. The tea is smooth, with a very thick body, and a soft natural fragrance. A crowd favorite across all types of tea drinkers.

Drink now or age a few years before drinking.


Pressed in 2020. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2020 Moon Waffles
description:
The 2020 Moon Waffles is a shade dried Yunnan white tea with a bud heavy picking standard.

A bright and floral fresh white tea with a supple sweetness and creamy, heavy body. Delicious tea at a great price.

Cakes are pressed into a tight waffle shape that can be easily broken apart without a pick or tea needle.

Each cake is 200g.

name: 2020 Modern Witch
description:
Our 2020 Modern Witch is a small batch shu Puer blend and the return of our sold out 2019 hit.

The return of our ambitious blend of several of our own small batch Puer teas, this blend has been years in the making, from raw material, through fermentation, to aging and blending. A well integrated, full bodied bitterness with a sweet balance and aroma. Drink now or age for a few years to experience these materials coming together.

Each cake is 200 grams of tea.

name: 2020 Milan Maocha Brick
description:
The 2020 Milan Maocha is a bit of a misnomer, how can a tea be both maocha [loose tea] and a brick? In this case, the term maocha refers to the Dancong oolong tea being left in its raw form before pressing. We commissioned this production to be left with stems and large leaves for this pressing. The roast is medium-heavy, roasted for 24 hours with the highest temperature at 125 C. The heavier roast will evolve and calm in the coming years, despite having a slight bite at the time of pressing.

The brick is incredibly fragrant, with deeper honey and floral flavors emerging throughout the course of a session. This tea is still slightly punchy, but the tea has a complex interplay between the roast and the brighter aspects of a traditional Milan Dancong. Excellent endurance, this tea can be re-steeped for a very long time. Drink now or age as you please.

Each brick is 200 grams.

name: 2020 Mirage
description:
The 2020 Mirage is an experimental blend of newly scoped out villages. Burly returning sweetness in the mouth and savory aromas accompany a fleeting bitterness. Slightly smokey tea with an intensely rustic flavor profile.

Each cake is 200 grams.

Pressed in 2020. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2020 Marion
description:
Our 2020 Marion is a commissioned yueguangbai, which is a shade dried white tea from Yunnan province. This production was made entirely of old arbor tea that is usually destined to be raw Puer tea. If you are accustomed to drinking yueguangbai teas with a bud heavy picking standard, you may notice that this tea has a lot of larger leaves; this is because when you make an old arbor tea you want to pick whatever the trees are giving and not waste a bit. The 2020 Conversation Pt.2 is the same material, but sun dried.

Natural processing of very high quality material which have yielded an entrancing white tea with complex flavor and aroma. Sweet, supple and a joy to drink.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2020 Mall Ninja Dojo
description:
Made from 2020 early spring Menghai area material that is not quite old arbor. This material is usually made into raw Puer, but this spring we commissioned productions of both sun dried white and sun dried black tea. The 2020 Mall Ninja Dojo and 2020 Horse Girl Clique are two teas made from identical material, but processed in two different ways.

The 2020 Mall Ninja Dojo is bright and aromatic with heavy full bodied character and even some residual astringency that signifies the character of the strength Menghai material. Floral and honey-like in its flavors and aromas, it's quite a unique white tea experience.


Pressed in 2020, Each cake is 200g. A tong is a stack of five cakes.

name: 2020 Lumber Slut
description:
Lumber Slut was pressed in 2020. The return of our heralded woody blend from 2017.

Blended to favor the dense flavors of petrichor and wood, this style of ripe Puer is focused on unfolding as an experience with notes of camphor and lower umber toned tastes. Will benefit from further aging, but if you're down for what this tea is offering, we suspect you can drink it straight away without flinching.

Each cake is 200 grams of tea.

name: 2020 Lucky Puppy
description:
The return of our classic blend.

The 2020 Lucky Puppy blend involves a wide range of high end material from several regions. The unique character of this tea is heavy with strength and depth. Lucky Puppy evolves from steep to steep in a gongfu brewing session, displaying a wide array of characteristics and a unique experience. The tea has a powerful aggressive character in earlier steeps, with a lasting huigan and complex returning flavors in the mouth. The later steeps trail off into a smooth, sweet sunset.

Drink now or age for the longer term.

Each cake is 200 grams.

Pressed in 2020. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2020 Loyal Soldier
description:
The 2020 Loyal Soldier is blended from entirely small batch material from several batches. This blend has a noticeable huigan (returning sweetness in the mouth) with a cooling full body and a bright flavor profile. Refreshing shu Puer with a sticky presence that will age beautifully.


Each cake is 200 grams of tea.

name: 2020 is a gift
description:
The return of our nearly sold out 2019 production, 2020 is a gift is a small production of difficult to acquire material that rarely sees the light of day in the larger market.

Succulent soothing broth. The soup is densely layered and calming with a unique fragrance that penetrates the liquor and lingers in the mouth and throat. A strong and engaging tea for special occasions.

Each cake is 200 grams.

Pressed in 2020. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2020 inb4
description:
Smooth, sweet and soft. The 2020 inb4 is a high quality blend with classic Yiwu style and a few slight tweaks from the 2019 inb4 blend. Balanced integration of the thick body, satin softness and lingering sweet flavors in the mouth that define the region. Perfect for long term storage or drinking straight away.

Each cake is 200 grams.

Pressed in 2020. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2020 La Sombra
description:
The 2020 La Sombra is the best bang for your buck raw Puer of the 2020 spring. A multi-region blend that walks the tightrope of fruity sweetness and savory undercurrent, depth and drinkability. Highly recommend this cake to both beginners who want to fall in love with raw Puer or veterans who want a daily workhorse tea that doesn't skimp on quality.

Each cake is 200 grams.

Pressed in 2020. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2020 I am
description:
The 2020 I am is my favorite blend of 2020. A blend of high end regions that are usually sold on their names alone. Complexity, body feel, flavor, aroma and smooth throughout. It's an experience.

Each cake is 200 grams.


Pressed in 2020. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2020 Hot Brandy Mini
description:
A blend of both white and black tea experiment gone horribly right, this is the latest version of our sold out 2016 Hot Brandy.

The soup is thick, smooth, and fragrant. It fares well with both gongfu style and western style brewing. The tea has excellent endurance and can steep for a very long time and can even withstand being simmered or boiled without becoming acrid.

Pressed into a convenient 7g ball, this is perfect for othermos brewing.

name: 2020 Hotline Space Coyote
description:
The 2020 Hotline Space Coyote has a classic, strong Menghai area character. Full on power with a smokey backdrop. Medium bitterness and astringency when pushed and a heavy bodied tea throughout. Intensity fiends can drink it straight away, the faint of heart might prefer to age it a bit.

Each cake is 200 grams.

Pressed in 2020. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2020 Horse Girl Clique
description:
Made from 2020 early spring Menghai area material that is not quite old arbor. This material is usually made into raw Puer, but this spring we commissioned productions of both sun dried black and sun dried white tea.

The 2020 Horse Girl Clique is sweet, chocolatey and full bodied. The malty sweetness  of the soup is flavorsome and intense. Aromas of dark red fruits and wild honey permeate the soup and leaves. A great tea to begin the day.

Pressed in 2020. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2020 Green Hype
description:
A full 200g cake of this tea will be featured in our June tea club. Join before May 31st to be a part of the club!

The latest installment in the Green Hype saga. A significant amount of aged material in the blend to smooth out the experience. The new material in the blend is punchy and full bodied with an intense huigan [the lingering sweetness in the mouth after drinking a tea]. Excellent daily drinking raw Puer with plenty of intrigue and character to keep you engaged from cup to cup.

Each cake is 200 grams. Tongs are 5 cakes wrapped in bamboo.

name: 2020 Good Man in a Storm
description:
2020 Good Man in a Storm was pressed on June 6th, 2020. A bright and punchy blend of Menghai area spring tea with a sweet core, up front astringency and a fresh floral fragrance.

This tea is a donation from white2tea to contribute in the fight against systemic racism in America. Every last cent of every cake sold will be donated equally between a group of roughly 80 charities supporting the current protests and ongoing fight against racism in America. We appreciate your support of this cake and you can read more here.

Each cake is 200 grams. Tongs are five cakes per bamboo leaf tong.

name: 2020 Fox Down
description:
Our new Fox Down is a Yunnan shai hong, sun dried black tea made from a bud heavy picking. 

Fox Down is a thick and malty black tea with a full bodied texture and supple sweetness. It brews well with any style, whether you are using a deft touch with gongfu brewing or tossing into your hot water bottle to take out into the world. A truly wonderful daily black tea.

Pressed in 2020. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2020 Fox Down Mini
description:
Our new Fox Down is a Yunnan shai hong, sun dried black tea made from a bud heavy picking. 

Fox Down is a thick and malty tea with a full bodied texture and supple sweetness. It brews well with any style, whether you are using a deft touch with gongfu brewing or tossing into your hot water bottle to take out into the world. A truly wonderful daily black tea.

When choosing size options, you can either choose a full stack or an individual mini. Each mini is roughly 7 grams, with 7 minis per stack.

name: 2020 Fenris Ulf
description:
The 2020 Fenris Ulf is a thick and powerful cup of tea with a well balanced amount of aggression. Burly flavors combined with a thick sweetness and plenty of staying power.

Potential to age, but smooth enough to drink straight away. This blend has an excellent price for a tea with many of the trappings of raw Puer in a higher price tier.

Each cake is 200 grams. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2020 Demon Slayer
description:
A new take on our high end huangpian blend from 2018 Demon Slayer.

Stab your personal demons in the face with our blend of high end huangpian [the large leaves of raw Puer production]. Thick, enduring tea with strong feeling and heavy complexity. A great opportunity to drink high end old arbor material within the confines of a reasonable budget. Age or drink now as your inner demon slayer desires.

Pressed in 2020, each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2020 Ecce Puer
description:
The 2020 Ecce Puer is a fragrant burst of bright aroma with a sweet core and balanced astringency.  The flavors are intensely fruity and floral with honey in the cup.

Each cake is 200 grams.

Pressed in 2020. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2020 Conversation Pt.2
description:
Our 2020 Conversation Pt.2 is a commissioned sun dried white tea from Yunnan province. This production was made entirely of old arbor tea that is usually destined to be raw Puer tea. This is the same material as the 2020 Marion, but with the difference of sun versus shade drying.

Natural processing of very high quality material which resulted in a truly wonderful white tea with complex flavor and aroma. Sweet, supple and a joy to drink now.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2020 Demon Slayer Minis
description:
A new take on our high end huangpian blend from 2018 Demon Slayer.

Stab your personal demons in the face with our blend of high end huangpian [the large leaves of raw Puer production]. Thick, enduring tea with strong feeling and heavy complexity. A great opportunity to drink high end old arbor material within the confines of a reasonable budget. Age or drink now as your inner demon slayer desires.

Pressed in 2020. Sold as stacks of seven minis or as individual 7g minis.

name: 2020 Camphornought
description:
Our 2020 Camphornought is a wallop of woody flavors and low toned aromas in a thick bodied, smooth tea. There is a slight touch of bitterness inside the burly forest of flavors and even a light faded smoke in the backdrop. If you're the type who enjoys whisky or a pipe on the porch, Camphornought is the shou Puer version of that.

Each cake is 200 grams of tea.

name: 2020 Camphornought Mini
description:
Our 2020 Camphornought is a wallop of woody flavors and low toned aromas in a thick bodied, smooth tea. There is a slight touch of bitterness inside the burly forest of flavors and even a light faded smoke in the backdrop. If you're the type who enjoys whisky or a pipe on the porch, Camphornought is like a shou Puer version of that.

Each purchase is for one 7 gram mini.

name: 2020 Brown Sugar
description:
The Brown Sugar blend has continued to evolve from its first version five years ago.

The 2020 Brown Sugar is a total departure from its predecessors. Heavier than ever before on non-huangpian tea and blended from entirely small batch material from several batches, this blend is thick, rich and enduring. Sweet throughout with an engaging set of flavors and aromas reminiscent of molasses. All around excellent tea for beginners and veterans alike.

Each brick is 200 grams of tea.

name: 2020 Biscuits
description:
The 2020 Biscuits was pressed with 2015 aged raw Puer material.

This high end material has sweet aromas of honey in a thick bodied, smooth and supple tea. It's an excellent balance for quality material with a touch of age at a reasonable price.

Each biscuit is 12 grams and can easily be snapped into two 6g sessions. Stacks are of 10 biscuits and roughly ~120g total.

name: 2020 Big O v2 Mini
description:
Our Big O v2 is a blend of our small batch shu Puer and chenpi (Mandarin orange skin). Each mini is roughly 7 grams, with 7 minis in each stack.

This blend focuses on the bright, less fermented aspects of shu Puer and a younger orange skin that offers a full citrus aroma. The tea has a thick body with sweet fruity flavors and a strong huigan (returning sweetness) in the mouth. Drink now or age as you please.

When choosing size options, you can either choose a full stack or an individual mini.

name: 2020 Bamboo Dove
description:
A long time coming; the remake of our first ever hand roasted bamboo white tea.

Our classic sun dried Yunnan white tea, Turtle Dove, roasted inside fragrant bamboo. The aromatics of the bamboo and the touch of the open flame are integrated with the white tea in a beautiful way. It has a complex character of sweetness and smoothness, melded with the heavy nature of the roast.

As with many bamboo teas, the processing tends to break the leaves a bit, leading to a more intense brew than usual. You might enjoy it better by knocking down your usual brew weight by a gram or two - or fly away on dove wings, if you prefer.

Each purchase is for 200 grams.

name: 2020 Big O v2
description:
Our Big O v2 is a blend of our small batch shu Puer and chenpi (Mandarin orange skin).

This blend focuses on the bright, less fermented aspects of shu Puer with a younger orange skin that offers a full citrus aroma. The tea has a thick body with sweet fruity flavors and a strong huigan (returning sweetness) in the mouth. Drink now or age as you please.

Each cake is 200 grams of tea.

name: 2020 Bamboo Shu
description:
The 2020 Bamboo Shu ripe Puer was processed using a traditional technique of bamboo processing where the tea is pressed into fresh fragrant bamboo and hand roasted over an open flame before being dried for long term storage.

The Bamboo Shu blend has a captivating aroma that balances the sweetness of our shou blend with the brighter fragrances of the bamboo. The tea is thick bodied and warming with a sweet character that will appeal to new ripe Puer drinkers and veteran Puer lovers alike. Drink immediately or age as you like.

Each purchase for a 200g piece will come enclosed in a bamboo shell similar to the one pictured, sizes and thicknesses will vary as one would expect with a plant.

name: 2020 Astro Red
description:
A pure spring commissioned production of our Astro Kittens blend, made into shai hong - sun dried black tea. 

This is a very small and experimental production of only around 5 kilograms. Generally speaking not many people would dare use early spring material of this caliber for black tea when they could easily sell if for high prices as raw Puer.

The tea has an intense brothy bitterness and feelings that will overwhelm all but the grizzled veterans among you. This isn't really a tea for beginners. 

I am not even sure who this is for.


Pressed in 2020. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2020 Arbor Red
description:
Old arbor large leaf varietal tea that is usually destined to be made in raw Puer, picked and processed in shaihong style tea with sun drying.

Arbor red is has an herbaceous fragrance and flavors that often border on medicinal. Sweetness underlies the complex flavors and heavy body of this tea. This is an enduring and heavy black tea best suited for a longer, gongfu style tea session.

Pressed in 2020. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2020 Astro Kittens
description:
The return of our 2019 bitter banger. The 2020 Astro Kittens is for bitter lovers. Bitterness that is extremely heavy, yet integrated with a complexity that few bitter teas offer. Depth, heavy feeling and a slight internal smokiness that flits over the tide of an intensely bitter body. Heavy enough to crush the spirits of most aspiring young sheng drinkers. Will age beautifully in the long term, or drink now and go to space, kitties.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2019 ZTMDKZ
description:
What would happen if you took a blend of high quality small batch shu material and aged Xinhui Mandarin orange peels, then roasted it all in fresh fragrant bamboo? A question that probably only white2tea would ask, but here goes nothing.

Our 2019 ZTMDKZ, which stands for "zhen ta ma de kua zhang" (which I'll loosely translate as "truly fucking ridiculous") is a blend made with a traditional technique of bamboo processing and aged chenpi. It is a very complex and medicinal heavy hitter. The soup is thick, the aromas are complicated and enduring, and the experience is wonderful. If you like unique teas, don't miss this one.

Each purchase is for for 200g of tea pressed into a piece of bamboo.

name: 2019 WTCCCTV
description:
The 2019 WTCCCTV is made from old arbor large leaf varietal tea that is usually destined to be made in raw Puer, picked and processed in shaihong [sun dried black tea] style tea with no machine processing.

WTCCCTV is a heavily sweet and full bodied black tea with a range of honey and fruit flavors that fluctuate between sweet grass and unripe pear. The natural style of sun dried processing means that leaves range in oxidation level, allowing for a complex experience with a bit of variation from session to session. This is an enduring and heavy black tea best suited for a longer, gongfu style tea session.

Pressed in 2019. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2020 Arbor White
description:
Old arbor large leaf varietal tea that is usually destined to be made in raw Puer, picked and directly sun dried with no machine processing involved.

Arbor white is deep and complex, thick tea with low tones and a heavy natural feel. This tea has a long development over the course of a session and can be powerful. Not an ideal daily drinker, the Arbor white is better left for occasions where one can immerse themselves in this tea.

Pressed in 2020. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2019 Well, Well
description:
The 2019 Well Well is a high quality blend of raw Puer from several regions. An intense blend that is contradictory in its character, shifting between elegant and ruthless. Plenty of subtle aspects to pick apart over the course of many sessions; we recommend this as a tea for people with several years of experience drinking Puer. Drink now or store as you please.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2019 Waffles
description:
The return of our much loved 2017 Waffles blend. A shou Puer tea with an easily approachable character, pressed into a convenient waffle pattern that can be broken apart without the use of a tea needle. An excellent everyday ripe Puer tea, with a soft sweetness and a smooth warming body. A well balanced ripe Puer tea for beginners or veteran drinkers alike.

Each cake is 200 grams of tea.

name: 2020 Amalgamation of Capital
description:
The 2020 Amalgamation of Capital Puer was processed using a traditional technique of bamboo processing where the tea is pressed into fresh fragrant bamboo and hand roasted over an open flame before being dried for long term storage.

This small batch blend was roasted for our tea club and we had a bit extra to throw onto the site. Heavy mouthfeel with a silky texture, the flavors of the shou Puer are complimented wonderfully with depth from the roast and the juices of the fresh fragrant bamboo which have infused into the leaves. A real treat.

Each purchase for a 100g piece will come enclosed in a bamboo shell similar to the one pictured, sizes and thicknesses will vary as one would expect with a plant.

name: 2019 Turtle Dove
description:
The 2019 Turtle Dove is a pressed white tea from Yunnan. Made from large leaf varietal material that is sun dried with no machine processing involved.

Our classic white tea has a thick body, soft mouthfeel, and a unique natural fragrance. Sweet and succulent with plenty of endurance for re-steeping. This tea is very forgiving with any type of brewing, including gongfu, western, or grandpa style. A perfect white tea to drink daily without much fuss.

Each cake is 200g.

name: 2019 Unicorn
description:
This tea is more of a personal production; a few kilograms of scraped together astronomically priced Yiwu. I wouldn't really recommend this tea for people who are new to drinking raw Puer. (under several years or so) The reasons this tea is phenomenal are not "slap in the face obvious", but it is unbelievably comforting to drink, like sweet silk covering your throat and stomach. Drink this tea if you are deep into Yiwu and have the budget, otherwise pretend you never saw this and buy the 2019 inb4 instead. It is a much better value and also a very high end Yiwu raw Puer.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2019 Undercover
description:
Pressed from our maocha reserves, this tea was dry stored tightly sealed since 2014 and pressed in spring 2019.

Entrancing aromatics and an emerging smooth character, the years have tempered the green youth out of the Undercover. Intense lingering huigan [returning sweetness] and bold flavor with an enduring core. Perfect for those seeking a high quality tea with a bit of age to drink right away, though this tea will benefit from further aging as you please.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2019 Tunji
description:
A limited production of 50 cakes pressed in 2019.

Complex and engaging raw Puer with a comfortable body feel and lasting sweet character.

Each cake is 200 grams.


Pressed in 2019. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2019 Tiltshift
description:
Our 2019 Tiltshift is an extremely bud heavy picking of yueguangbai, which is a shade dried white tea from Yunnan province. This is a light and easy to drink white tea with a smooth body and sweet aftertaste. The aroma is soft and inviting, as is the tea.

Each cake is 200 grams.
Pressed in 2019. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2019 Tiltshift Mini
description:
Our 2019 Tiltshift is an extremely bud heavy picking of. yueguangbai, which is a shade dried white tea from Yunnan province. This is a light and easy to drink white tea with a smooth body and sweet aftertaste. The aroma is soft and inviting, as is the tea. A lovely daily drinker.

Each purchase is for one ~ 7 gram ball.
Tiltshift was pressed in 2019. Roughly 7g of tea per ball.

name: 2019 Tiltshift Bamboo
description:
Our 2019 Tiltshift blend in a bamboo roasted version. An extremely bud heavy picking of yueguangbai, which is a shade dried white tea from Yunnan province. The processing of the tea have broken it up significantly, which means this tea will steep out stronger and more quickly due to the increased surface area. This is a smooth drinking white tea with a supple body and sweet aftertaste. The aroma of fragrant bamboo and the roast have thoroughly pentetrated the tea, making for a delicious brew.

Each piece of bamboo was pressed with 200 grams of tea.

name: 2019 The People's Champ
description:
The 2019 The People's Champ is a shu Puer blend with big value. The blend has excellent balance of fragrance, body and flavor but without the price tag to match. It is solid, sweet and smooth, blended with plenty of our own aged material to balance the freshness of a shu Puer and make it immediately enjoyable. If you're searching for a blend for daily drinking that punches above its weight, pick The Champ.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2019 The Great Divide
description:
The 2019 The Great Divide is a shu Puer blend with a heavy, full throttle bitterness. The thick soup is smooth and cooling with a long lasting bitterness in the mouth. Ready to drink now, but will continue to age towards medicinal, woody character over the coming years.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2019 Splendid
description:
The new edition of our popular daily Puer tea to fit any budget. Like our 2018 Splendid, the 2019 has a strong huigan [lasting sweetness] and punchy flavor. This year's blend has the addition of a new region which adds another layer of complexity to the tea. A punchy, young tea with flavor to spare and blended to be wallet friendly.

Each cake is 200 grams.


Pressed in 2019. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2019 Snoozefest
description:
(this again)

Snoozefest is a limited edition blend of tea that we would normally sell for over $40 per cake, however, we are selling it for $15 for each 200 gram cake ($75 per 1kg tong). 'Tis the season for hype, generosity and laughter.

No samples needed.

First come, first serve.

Drink now or age for the long haul.

Enjoy the tea.

;-)


Pressed in 2019. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2019 Road 2 Nowhere
description:
A limited production of 30 cakes pressed in 2019.

Complex and engaging raw Puer with a heavy body feel and thick saline sweet soup.

Each cake is 200 grams.

Pressed in 2019. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are individual, with no tong wrapping.

name: 2019 Snake Wraith
description:
A hand roasted bamboo raw Puer blend made from high end material. The bamboo processing of this tea means that the leaves are broken up, so the tea will brew faster and stronger due to the increased surface area.

A complex flavor and fragrance spectrum with a thick body and heavy feeling. This tea drinks fairly smooth for such a young blend, but tends to come on strong with the feelings it elicits.

Each piece of bamboo was pressed with 200 grams of tea.

name: 2019 Pretty Girls
description:
The 2019 Pretty Girls Ripe Puer Tea is the return of our sold out 2018 blend.

The blend has a beautiful aroma. If one were to try and place it in a broad category in might be a pulling a hot tray of freshly baked cherry danishes from a wood-fired oven type, but we will leave that up to you. Pretty Girls quickly proceeds into sweet shou territory after the rinse. The velvety texture of the soup and complex flavors develop over the coming steeps and eventually settle into a soft sweet profile that can be infused over and over. Drink immediately or age as your prefer.

Each brick is 100g and can be easily broken apart by hand. Tongs contain 5 bricks (500g of tea).

name: 2020 Ajai
description:
The 2020 Ajai is a sweet and syrupy treat with a fruity floral profile and a mouth watering broth. A crowd pleasing tea that is fit for a beginner exploring higher end teas or a Puer veteran seeking out a complex daily cup.

Each cake is 200 grams.

Pressed in 2020. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2019 Nightfall Bamboo
description:
A hand roasted bamboo version of our 2019 Nightfall is a commissioned yueguangbai, which is a shade dried white tea from Yunnan province. This production was made entirely of old arbor tea that is usually destined to be raw Puer tea. If you are accustomed to drinking yueguangbai teas with a bud heavy picking standard, you may notice that this tea has a lot of larger leaves; this is because when you make an old arbor tea you want to pick whatever the trees are giving and not waste a bit of it. The bamboo processing of this tea means that the leaves are broken up, so the tea will brew faster and stronger due to the increased surface area.

This tea has a thick enduring aroma and flavor with a hefty, silky body. The base character of the tea has been wonderfully integrated with the roasted flavors and sweet aroma of the bamboo.

Each piece of bamboo was pressed with 200 grams of tea.

name: 2019 Nightfall
description:
Our 2019 Nightfall is a commissioned yueguangbai, which is a shade dried white tea from Yunnan province. This production was made entirely of old arbor tea that is usually destined to be raw Puer tea. If you are accustomed to drinking yueguangbai teas with a bud heavy picking standard, you may notice that this tea has a lot of larger leaves; this is because when you make an old arbor tea you want to pick whatever the trees are giving and not waste a bit of it.

This tea has a thick enduring aroma and flavor with a hefty, silky body. A beautiful cake that any lover of white teas must try.

Each cake is 200 grams.
Pressed in 2019. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2019 Natural Redhead
description:
The return of our classic Yunnan black tea.

Made from large leaf varietal material, the tea is sun dried, with no machine processing involved. The tea is smooth, with a very thick body, and a soft natural fragrance. A crowd favorite across all types of tea drinkers.

Drink now or age a few years before drinking.
Pressed in 2019. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2019 Modern Witch
description:
The 2019 Modern Witch is the most ambitious shu Puer blend we have made to date. A blend of several of our own small batch Puer teas, this blend has been a few years in the making, from raw material, through fermentation, to aging and blending. A well integrated, full bodied bitterness with a sweet balance and aroma. Drink now or age for a few years to experience these materials coming together.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2019 Mini O'Bitters
description:
A mini one session coin of our 2019 Dripd O'Bitters.

The 2019 Dripd O’Bitters is a blend of shu Puer tea with well aged chenpi. We selected an aged production of chenpi to accentuate the medicinal, bitter qualities of the blend with an aroma of deep citrus. The result is a rich, smooth concoction of shu Puer tea and chenpi that is likely different from any tea you have ever tried.

Each purchase is for one ~ 7 gram coin.
Dripd O'Bitters minis were pressed in 2019. Roughly 7g of tea per coin.

name: 2019 Milan Maocha Brick
description:
The 2019 Milan Maocha is a bit of a misnomer, how can a tea be both maocha [loose tea] and a brick? In this case, the term maocha refers to the Dancong oolong tea being left in its raw form before pressing. We commissioned this production to be left with stems and large leaves for this pressing. The roast is medium-heavy, roasted for 24 hours with the highest temperature at 125 C. The heavier roast will evolve and calm in the coming years, despite having a slight bite at the time of pressing.

The brick is incredibly fragrant, with deeper honey and floral flavors emerging throughout the course of a session. This tea is still slightly punchy, but the tea has a complex interplay between the roast and the brighter aspects of a traditional Milan Dancong. Excellent endurance, this tea can be re-steeped for a very long time. Drink now or age as you please.

Each brick is 200 grams. Each tong is a bamboo leaf packed with two bricks.
