Pressed in 2019 using Milan Dancong maocha [in this case, referring to the unsorted tea directly after processing. This tea includes stems and larger leaves]. Each brick is 200g. Bricks are packed in bamboo leaves, with two bricks in a tong.

name: 2019 Marion
description:
Our 2019 Marion is a commissioned yueguangbai, which is a shade dried white tea from Yunnan province. This production was made entirely of old arbor tea that is usually destined to be raw Puer tea. If you are accustomed to drinking yueguangbai teas with a bud heavy picking standard, you may notice that this tea has a lot of larger leaves; this is because when you make an old arbor tea you want to pick whatever the trees are giving and not waste a bit. The 2019 Conversation Pt.2 is the same material, but sun dried.

The first white tea production this farmer has ever made. Natural processing of very high quality material which have yielded an entrancing white tea with complex flavor and aroma. Sweet, supple and a joy to drink.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2019 Lumber Balls
description:
A mini one session ball made with our Lumber Slut blend.

Blended to favor the dense flavors of petrichor and wood, this style of ripe Puer is focused on unfolding as an experience with notes of camphor and lower umber toned tastes. Will benefit from further aging, but if you’re down for what this tea is offering, we suspect you can drink it straight away without flinching.

Each purchase is for one ~ 7 gram ball.
Lumber balls was pressed in 2019. Roughly 7g of tea per ball.

name: 2019 Lucky Puppy
description:
The return of our benchmark blend from 2018.

The 2019 Lucky Puppy blend involves a wide range of high end material from several regions. The unique character of this tea is heavy with strength and depth. Lucky Puppy evolves from steep to steep in a gongfu brewing session, displaying a wide array of characteristics and a unique experience. The tea has a powerful aggressive character in earlier steeps, with a lasting huigan and complex returning flavors in the mouth. The later steeps trail off into a smooth, sweet sunset.

Drink now or age for the longer term.

Each cake is 200 grams.


Pressed in 2019. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2019 Liu'An Tegong
description:
Liu'An heicha, also known as dark tea, a post fermented tea from Anhui province in China.

Tegong Liuan, which is made from what is lauded as "wild" material, is a brothy and intense tea with heavy hitting power underneath a smooth and thick body. Powerful aromas of spice and layered sweet flavors throughout.

Made to age, but enjoyable straight away.

Baskets contain ~250g of loosely pressed tea.

name: 2019 Liu'An Gongjian
description:
Liu'An heicha, also known as dark tea, a post fermented tea from Anhui province in China.

Gongjian Liuan is a slightly more coarse material than it's Tegong counterpart, spicy with a bite and lingering returning sweetness. The years of age on this tea have smoothed out the sharpest aspects of the tea.

Made to age, but those enjoy an intense cup will enjoy it straight away.

Baskets contain ~250g of loosely pressed tea.

name: 2019 Laconic
description:
The 2019 Laconic is a well balanced raw Puer blend with everything you want; aroma, flavor, sweetness, body and balance. Excellent tea that will not kill your wallet. Age or drink now, your call.

Cakes are 200 grams.
Pressed in 2019. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2019 January 9th 5:15 AM
description:
The 2019 January 9th 5:15 AM 2019 is an experimental blend with a slow inertia that builds into a rumbling avalanche of bitterness, sweetness and aroma. The body is smooth throughout the session, entering on the initial steeps with a whisper before gaining momentum. A blend of several regions with a unique character unlike any other white2tea blend.

Each cake is 200 grams.


Pressed in 2019. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2019 is a gift
description:
2019 is a gift is a small production of difficult to acquire material that rarely sees the light of day in the larger market.

Succulent soothing broth. The soup is densely layered and calming with a unique fragrance that penetrates the liquor and lingers in the mouth and throat. A strong and engaging tea for special occasions.

Each cake is 200 grams.


Pressed in 2019. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2019 inb4
description:
Smooth, sweet and soft. 2019 inb4 is a high quality blend with classic Yiwu style. Balanced integration of the thick* body, satin softness and lingering sweet flavors in the mouth that define the region. Perfect for long term storage or drinking straight away.

Each cake is 200 grams.
*dummy thicc

Pressed in 2019. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2019 If You're Reading This
description:
A new version of our 2015 blend, the 2019 If You're Reading This.

The soup is smooth, with a sweet floral and fruity huigan [returning sweetness] that lasts long after the session is over. This is an adjusted version from the original blend, but has a majority of the same base material, with the addition of two new regions. There is an improved depth of character and complexity that take the original blend in a new direction. Excellent tea for the price, with potential to age or perfect for fresh sheng lovers.

Each cake is 200 grams.


Pressed in 2019. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2019 Hot Brandy
description:
A blend of both white and black tea experiment gone horribly right, this is the latest incarnation of our sold out 2016 Hot Brandy. The soup is thick, smooth, and fragrant. It fares well with both gongfu style and western style brewing. The tea has excellent endurance and can steep for a very long time and can even withstand being simmered or boiled without becoming acrid.

Both the white tea and black tea have been sun dried and should age well together. However, we are only two three years deep on this experiment; though the results are promising, how it will age in the long term is anybody's guess.


Hot Brandy is a mix of both white tea and black tea. 200g cake pressed in 2019. Each bamboo tong contains 5 cakes.

name: 2019 Grandpa's
description:
The return of an old favorite, with a new blend; the 2019 Grandpa's was hand pressed in 2019.

Our Grandpa's ripe Puer tea is a 7 gram ball that is blended with the intention that you will not handle it with care. Meant to be tossed into a cup, mug, or thermos and brewed grandpa style with very little attention. Just a quick boiling rinse, add boiling water and enjoy. The Grandpa's has a smooth body and a classic heavy bodied shu character that has legs.

Each purchase is for one ~ 7 gram ball.
The Grandpa's tea ball was hand pressed in 2019. Roughly 7g of tea per ball.

name: 2019 Green Hype
description:
A full 200g cake of this tea will be featured in our June tea club. Join before May 31st to be a part of the club!

The latest version of our lauded 2018 Green Hype. The 2019 Green Hype has a significant amount of aged material in the blend to smooth it out from the start. A formidable thickness and full bodied mouthfeel with an intense huigan [the lingering sweetness in the mouth after drinking a tea]. Excellent daily drinking raw Puer with plenty of intrigue and character to keep you engaged from cup to cup. Age or chug immediately as you please.

Each cake is 200 grams.

The stamp on this cake is incorrect, reading 2018-8, rather than 2019-4, when it was actually pressed. This was a mistake during stamping/wrapping at the factory, but the correct pressing date is from late April of 2019.

name: 2019 Gore of the Forest
description:
The 2019 Gore of the Forest is a complex blend of many disparate materials that unite together in an engaging experience of pithy fragrance, flavor and feeling. The weighty body of the tea is full of surprises, evolving from steep to steep throughout a long gongfu session. Drink now or age for the long haul.

Each cake is 200 grams.
Pressed in 2019. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2019 Gold 8
description:
Limited release pressing of very carefully selected huangpian [literally gold flake, the large leaves from Puer production].

High end material with a smooth heavy body and a low undercurrent of intense and well integrated bitterness. Beautiful to drink now or age.

Each cake is 200 grams.
Pressed in 2019. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2019 duh
description:
Juicy thick bodied tea with huigan [lasting sweetness] and plenty of flavor. The 2019 duh is well balanced and suitable for new raw Puer drinkers who would like to try higher quality tea or veteran drinkers who are searching for high quality fresh sheng on a reasonable budget.

Each cake is 200 grams.


Pressed in 2019. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2019 Dripd O'Bitters
description:
The 2019 Dripd O'Bitters is a blend of shu Puer tea with well aged chenpi. We selected an aged production of chenpi to accentuate the medicinal, bitter qualities of the blend with an aroma of deep citrus. The result is a rich, smooth concoction of shu Puer tea and chenpi that is likely different from any tea you have ever tried.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2019 Dangerfield
description:
The 2019 Dangerfield was blended with an intention of being a poor man's Naka. The tea is extremely fragrant and smooth with an astonishing huigan [lingering sweetness]. The complex aroma and sweetness shift from steep to steep. This is a blend that punches far above its weight. An excellent value and a great candidate for both veteran Puer drinkers and people who want to take the plunge into the raw Puer ocean.

Each cake is 200 grams.


Pressed in 2019. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2019 Conversation Pt.2
description:
Our 2019 Conversation Pt.2 is a commissioned sun dried white tea from Yunnan province. This production was made entirely of old arbor tea that is usually destined to be raw Puer tea. This is the same material as the 2019 Marion, but with the difference of sun versus shade drying.

The first white tea production this farmer has ever made. Natural processing of very high quality material which resulted in a truly wonderful white tea with complex flavor and aroma. Sweet, supple and a joy to drink now.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2019 Censers
description:
The 2019 return of our specially commissioned baimudan grade white tea from Guizhou province.

Censers is an elegant white tea with a full bodied smoothness. The tea has a bright and complex fragrance that endures throughout a long session, lingering in the mouth and the cups long after the tea has gone. The fragrances and flavors shift between sweet floral aromas and fresh light fruits.

Each cake is 200g.

Pressed in 2019. Each cake is 200g.

name: 2019 Carbolic Soap
description:
The return of our 2018 Carbolic Soap.

Each cake is 200 grams.
The 2019 Carbolic Soap is a high quality Milan Dancong oolong that we really enjoyed and wanted to age for our own consumption. In order to justify the purchase we also decided to sell some of this limited pressing.

Medium fragrance, heavy body with an intense body feeling. The cake is pressed tightly for the long haul.

Pressed in 2019 using Milan Dancong oolong tea from Guangdong province in China. Each cake is 200g. Cakes are packed in bamboo tongs with five cakes per tong.

name: 2019 Builders
description:
A hand roasted bamboo black tea, the 2019 Builders is a perfect balance of working class utility and artisan tea snobbery. It is our white2tea twist on the classic concept strong style of "builder's tea" from the UK. This bud heavy whole leaf Yunnan sun dried tea was mercilessly crammed into bamboo and hand roasted over an open flame.

The result is a shard heavy tea with many of broken bits and plenty of surface area which cause the tea to steep out very quickly making a very potent brew for an afternoon pick me up or a morning eye opener. This tea is very versatile with a heavy aroma of fragrant bamboo, malt and honey; not to mention a booming lingering aftertaste. Steep in gongfu style like a bamboo loving connoisseur or western style topped off with cream like you have a job to do.

The mash up of style and function makes this unique tea a common morning cup in the white2tea house.

Each piece of bamboo was pressed with 200 grams of tea.

name: 2019 Budget Bitter
description:
Limited release cake of intolerably bitter raw Puer from your favorite budget tea company, white2tea. Only for true lovers of unbelievable bitterness. You'll wonder "how is this much bitterness even possible?!" Don't worry friends, we wonder the same.

Each cake is 200 grams.
Pressed in 2019. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2019 both steal boats
description:
This blend has a fair amount of aged material in the mix. The smooth and quiet initial steeps of the tea belie a layered complexity with a focus on sweeter Menghai style character. The intense feel of the tea creeps up on feather foot steps and strikes out of nowhere. The aromas have a range from grapes to sweet honey, with a bit of fresh florals from the younger materials. Not the type of tea you would want to chug at work, better to set aside time for a long session.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2019 Bamboo Shu
description:
The 2019 Bamboo Shu ripe Puer was processed using a traditional technique of bamboo processing where the tea is pressed into fresh fragrant bamboo and hand roasted over an open flame before being dried for long term storage.

The Bamboo Shu blend has a captivating aroma that balances the sweetness of our shou blend with the brighter fragrances of the bamboo. The tea is thick bodied and warming with a sweet character that will appeal to new ripe Puer drinkers and veteran Puer lovers alike. Drink immediately or age as you like.

Each purchase for a 200g piece will come enclosed in a bamboo shell similar to the one pictured, sizes and thicknesses will vary as one would expect with a plant.

name: 2019 Astro Kittens
description:
The 2019 Astro Kittens is for bitter lovers. Bitterness that is extremely heavy, yet integrated with a complexity that few bitter teas offer. Depth, heavy feeling and a slight internal smokiness that flits over the tide of an intensely bitter body. Heavy enough to crush the spirits of most aspiring young sheng drinkers. Will age beautifully in the long term, or drink now and go to space, kitties.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2019 Arbor White
description:
Old arbor large leaf varietal tea that is usually destined to be made in raw Puer, picked and directly sun dried with no machine processing involved. We also have a black tea version of the same material.

Arbor white is deep and complex, thick tea with low tones and a heavy natural feel. This tea has a long development over the course of a session and can be powerful. Not an ideal daily drinker, the Arbor white is better left for occasions where one can immerse themselves in this tea.

Pressed in 2019. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2019 Arbor Red
description:
Old arbor large leaf varietal tea that is usually destined to be made in raw Puer, picked and processed in shaihong style tea with sun drying. We also have a white tea version of the same material.


Arbor red is has an herbaceous fragrance and flavors that often border on medicinal. Sweetness underlies the complex flavors and heavy body of this tea. This is an enduring and heavy black tea best suited for a longer, gongfu style tea session.

Pressed in 2019. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2018 Year of the Dog
description:
Our Year of the Dog cake has a heavy and layered aroma that is potent and ever-present within the soup of the tea. An extremely smooth young tea with complex top notes and sweetness that will eventually age into a honey like body. A very comfortable tea to drink young or age.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2018 Waffles
description:
The return of our much loved 2017 Waffles blend. A shou Puer tea with an easily approachable character, pressed into a convenient waffle pattern that can be broken apart without the use of a tea needle. An excellent everyday ripe Puer tea, with a soft sweetness and a smooth warming body. A well balanced ripe Puer tea for beginners or veteran drinkers alike.

Each cake is 200 grams of tea.

name: 2018 Turtle Dove
description:
The 2018 Turtle Dove is a pressed white tea from Yunnan. Made from large leaf varietal material, the tea is sun dried, with no machine processing involved. Pressed more loosely than the 2017 brick version.

The tea has a thick body, soft mouthfeel, and a unique natural fragrance. This tea is very forgiving with any type of brewing, including gongfu, western, or grandpa style. A perfect white tea to drink daily without much fuss.

Pressed in 2018. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2018 White Tripel
description:
The 2018 White Tripel is a blend of white tea that incorporates six different teas from three different provinces. The provinces of Fujian, Yunnan, and Guizhou are all present in the blend. The broad range of materials unite together to form a layered experience of smooth, fragrant sweetness. The Tripel has a complex floral base and creamy texture in the mouth. The flavors evolve from steep to steep as different materials contribute their character. We prefer this tea brewed gongfu style, but it also does well grandpa style or even simmered.

We hope you have the opportunity to try this unique blend of tea. Suitable for aging or immediate drinking.

Each cake is 200 grams.

Pressed in 2018. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2018 Tunji
description:
A limited production of 50 cakes pressed in 2018.

Complex and engaging raw Puer with a comfortable body feel and lasting sweet character.

Each cake is 200 grams.


Pressed in 2018. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are wrapped in bamboo leaf tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2018 The Box
description:
Unique fragrance and sweetness with depth throughout the session. Heavy body feel and distinct character. The flavors of each steep recur and transform in the mouth with a lingering sweetness and aftertaste. We would recommend for more experienced Puer tea drinkers. We also recommend drinking this tea when you have a bit of free time to experience the time between steeps with focused attention.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2018 Teadontlie
description:
A return of our popular 2016 blend. A blend of raw Puer material that has a sweet, thick body. A heavy interior fruity floral fragrance and a bitey astringency that will calm down with age.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2018 Swinedog 76
description:
A 2018 remake of our 2017 Swinedog 76.

Very potent tea with a strong bitterness and body feel with distinct character. It takes several steeps to gain momentum and then begins punishing everything and everyone foolish enough to get in its way.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2018 Sugar Rush
description:
Old arbor large leaf varietal tea that is usually destined to be made in raw Puer, picked and processed into shaihong style tea with sun drying.


Sugar Rush has a thick, rich sweetness and thick body. The development of flavor and fragrance over the course of a session is complex and engaging, with an underlying sweetness carrying throughout. This is an enduring and heavy black tea best suited for a longer, gongfu style tea session.

Pressed in 2018. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2018 Sun Fu
description:
Anhua heicha fu zhuan, or fu brick, is a post fermented tea from Hunan province in China that contains "golden flowers" (eurotium cristatum).

Not your average fu brick. After sampling endlessly throughout Anhua, the final victor among the legions of fu bricks vying for a coveted spot in the curated white2tea lineup.

Beautiful tea all around. Thick and rich with plenty of feeling, but without being too overwhelming for the daily cup. Sweet and aromatic daily fu that screams its value with every steep. Can not express how quickly you will tear through a kilogram brick.

Each brick is ~1000g of pressed tea.

Disclaimer: We've heard that people suffering from gluten allergies may be sensitive to Fu zhuan / eurotium cristatum. Best to avoid this tea if you are sensitive or have Celiac disease

name: 2018 Splendid
description:
A fresh young daily Puer tea to fit any budget. Strong huigan [lasting sweetness] and punchy flavor. This tea is for lovers of youthful Puer with a little bite.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2018 Snoozefest
description:
(this again)

Snoozefest is a limited edition blend of tea (only 100 cakes) that we would normally sell for over $40 per cake, however, we are selling it for $15 for each 200 gram cake ($75 per 1kg tong). 'Tis the season for hype, generosity and laughter.

No samples.

First come, first serve.

Drink now or age for the long haul.

All love.

;-)


Pressed in 2018. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2018 Smoove Cocoa
description:
One of our favorite blends of ripe Puer for 2018, Smoove Cocoa is suitable for any style of brewing. An engaging and balanced tea with a complex flavor profile and a silky smoove body. An ideal shou for both new and veteran Puer drinkers alike. Drink immediately or age as you please.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2018 Smoove Cocoa Minis
description:
Smoove Cocoa Minis are a mini version of the 2018 Smoove Cocoa. They were pressed in 2018. Eachminiis roughly 7 grams, with 7 minis in each stack.

One of our favorite blends of ripe Puer for 2018, Smoove Cocoa is suitable for any style of brewing. An engaging and balanced tea with a complex flavor profile and a silky smoove body. An ideal shou for both new and veteran Puer drinkers alike. Drink immediately or age as you please.

Price is per shortstack of seven minis.
Pressed in 2018 with ripe Puer. Roughly 7g of tea per mini. Each mini tong has 7 minis.

name: 2018 Queen of Clubs
description:
Classic style Yiwu blend of high end material. Deep complexity and smooth mouthfeel with a deceptive amount of strength. An elegant and powerful tea. Drink now or age for a century.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2018 Pussy
description:
A return of our infamous 2017 blend. Pussy is a sweet, heavy tea with a potent fragrance. This tea is great to drink right away or age for the long term.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2018 Pretty Girls
description:
The 2018 Pretty Girls Ripe Puer Tea from white2tea is a newly improved upon nod to our sold out 2015 blend.

The blend has a beautiful aroma. If one were to try and place it in a broad category in might be a pulling a hot tray of freshly baked cherry danishes from a wood-fired oven type, but we will leave that up to you. Pretty Girls quickly proceeds into sweet shou territory after the rinse. The velvety texture of the soup and complex flavors develop over the coming steeps and eventually settle into a soft sweet profile that can be infused over and over. Drink immediately or age as your prefer.
The Pretty Girls cake was machine pressed in 2018. 200g cakes, with 5 cakes in a bamboo tong.

name: 2018 Nightlife
description:
Back by popular demand after 2016 & 2017 sold out.

Nightlife is a bud heavy, high grade production of yueguangbai [moonlight white] style tea, commissioned from large leaf varietal material usually destined for raw Puer tea.

The tea has a heavy, creamy mouth feel with an airy sweetness and aroma. An enduring white tea with distinct character.

name: 2018 Peace Lily
description:
This tea was produced in 2018 using a traditional technique for bamboo Puer pressing.

Peace Lily is a production of Huanpian [larger, older Puer leaves] that were hand roasted in fragrant bamboo. The young tea still has a touch of astringency, with the sweet character and aroma of the tea peaking through the fragrances of the bamboo and the flame. A thick bodied and heavy tea when pushed, lighter amounts of tea can also be brewed for a refreshing, fragrant cup of tea. Suitable for aging or drinking now as your prefer.

Each full piece is roughly 200 grams of tea, with samples available.

name: 2018 Natural Redhead
description:
Back by popular demand, the 2018 Natural Redhead is a pressed black tea from Yunnan, made in a dianhong style. Made from large leaf varietal material, the tea is sun dried, with no machine processing involved. The tea is smooth, with a very thick body, and a soft natural fragrance.

Drink now or age a few years before drinking.
Pressed in 2018. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2018 Mini Redheads
description:
Our Mini Redhead is a single serving version of our popular Natural Redhead; a pressed black tea from Yunnan, made in a dianhong style. Made from large leaf varietal material, the tea is sun dried, with no machine processing involved. The tea is smooth, with a very thick body, and a soft natural fragrance.

Each mini cake is 7 grams, each purchase is for one mini cake.
Roughly 7 gram mini cakes of Yunnan black tea.

name: 2018 Lumber Slut
description:
Lumber Slut was pressed in 2018. The return of our heralded woody blend from 2017.

Blended to favor the dense flavors of petrichor and wood, this style of ripe Puer is focused on unfolding as an experience with notes of camphor and lower umber toned tastes. Will benefit from further aging, but if you're down for what this tea is offering, we suspect you can drink it straight away without flinching.

Each cake is 200 grams of tea.

name: 2018 Milan Maocha Brick
description:
The 2018 Milan Maocha is a bit of a misnomer, how can a tea be both maocha [loose tea] and a brick? In this case, the term maocha refers to the Dancong oolong tea being left in its raw form before pressing. We commissioned this production to be left with stems and large leaves for this pressing. The roast is also medium-heavy, roasted for 24 hours with the highest temperature at 125 C. We wanted a heavier roast that could evolve and calm in the coming years, despite having a slight bite at the time of pressing.

The brick is incredibly fragrant, with deeper honey and floral flavors emerging throughout the course of a session. This tea is still slightly punchy, but the tea has a complex interplay between the roast and the brighter aspects of a traditional Milan Dancong. Drink now or age as you please.

Each brick is 200 grams. Each tong is a bamboo leaf packed with two bricks.
Pressed in 2018 using Milan Dancong maocha [in this case, referring to the unsorted tea directly after processing. This tea includes stems and larger leaves]. Each brick is 200g. Bricks are packed in bamboo leaves, with two bricks in a tong.

name: 2018 Lullaby
description:
High grade baimudan [white peony] style white tea from Yunnan.

Lullaby is fruity, sweet, fresh and bright. Well balanced white tea with a soft mouthfeel, intriguing fragrance and plenty of flavor to keep you coming back for one more cup.

Pressed in 2018. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2018 Lucky Puppy
description:
The most complex blend of 2018, involving a wide range of high end material from several regions. The unique character of this tea is heavy with strength. Lucky Puppy evolves from steep to steep in a gongfu brewing session, displaying a wide array of characteristics and a unique experience. The tea has a powerful aggressive character in earlier steeps, with a lasting huigan and depth of returning flavor. The later steeps trail off into smooth sweetness and can be resteeped many times. Drink now or age if you can keep your hands off this puppy.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2018 Little Lullaby
description:
A mini cake of our high grade baimudan [white peony] Lullaby white tea from Yunnan.

Lullaby is fruity, sweet, fresh and bright. Well balanced white tea with a soft mouthfeel, intriguing fragrance and plenty of flavor to keep you coming back for one more cup.

Each mini cake is 7 grams, each purchase is for one mini cake.

name: 2018 Hot Brandy
description:
A blend of both white and black tea experiment gone horribly right, this is the latest incarnation of our sold out 2016 Hot Brandy. The soup is thick, smooth, and fragrant. It fairs well with both gongfu style and western style brewing. The tea has excellent endurance and can steep for a very long time and can even withstand being simmered or boiled without becoming acrid.

Both the white tea and black tea have been sun dried and should age well together. However, we are only two years deep on this experiment; though the results are promising, how it will age in the long term is anybody's guess.

name: 2018 Gongmei
description:
Stored in dry/natural conditions in Fujian until being moved to our Guangzhou warehouse in 2021, this baicha [white tea] from Fuding county in Fujian province is considered to be Gongmei grade white tea, which has more buds and higher grade leaf than a Shoumei.

Excellent value for a young white tea with the beginnings of an aged profile. The thick body of this tea has a heavy sweetness and beautiful array of bright and spicy fragrances. This tea is very versatile and suitable for further aging or drinking directly.

Each cake is 360 grams.

name: 2018 Green Hype
description:
A new version of our popular 2017 Big Green Hype. This 2018 Green Hype has a formidable thickness and full bodied mouthfeel. The tea is sweet and boasts an intense huigan [the lingering sweetness in the mouth after drinking a tea]. Drink this tea young if you don't mind a touch of aggression in your tea, otherwise age for a bit to smooth out the edges.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2018 Ghosts
description:
Ghosts has a base of Menghai character blended with several other areas. Youthful and brash with a balance between astringency, bitterness and sweetness. Complex fragrance and character for a tea in this price range. Suitable for long term aging.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2018 Flapjacks Ripe Puer
description:
Flap Jacks ripe was pressed in 2018. Each flap jack is roughly 7 grams, with 7 flapjacks in each short stack.

This blend of ripe Puer is suitable for any style of brewing. It has a sweet flavor and inviting fragrance that make it a solid daily drinker for new and veteran Puer drinkers alike. Soothing and smooth, a lovely ripe blend. The easy to steep shape makes it an ideal tea to grab on the go.

Price is per shortstack of 7.
Pressed in 2018 with ripe Puer. Roughly 7g of tea per flapjack. Each short stack has 7 flapjacks.

name: 2018 Demon Slayer
description:
Stab your personal demons in the face with this blend of high end huangpian [the large leaves of raw Puer production]. Thick, enduring tea with residual youthful astringency and bitterness. Age or drink now as your inner demon slayer desires.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2018 Flapjacks Raw Puer
description:
Flap Jacks raw was pressed in 2018. Each flap jack is roughly 7 grams, with 7 flapjacks in each short stack.

Conveniently pressed into an easy single steep shape, the tea is still young and astringent as one would expect from a fresh raw Puer tea. The tea has a punchy fresh fragrance and sweetness. Don't let the cute shape fool you, this tea is just as engaging as its larger counterparts.

Price is per shortstack of 7.
Pressed in 2018 with raw Puer. Roughly 7g of tea per flapjack. Each short stack has 7 flapjacks.

name: 2018 Chirping Bird
description:
Elegant, sweet and fragrant. One of our most complex blends of the spring. The floral aromas and juicy character of this tea lull the drinker into an ease of drinking that masks the potency of this tea. Suitable to drink now or age as desired.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2018 Censers
description:
A specially commissioned baimudan grade white tea from Guizhou province. We tried and fell in love with this tea in 2017, but were too late to buy any of the material. In the spring of 2018 we had our money in the producers hands before the buds were plucked.


Censers is an elegant white tea with a full bodied smoothness. The tea has a bright and complex fragrance that endures throughout a long session, lingering in the mouth and the cups long after the tea has gone. The fragrances and flavors shift between sweet floral aromas and fresh light fruits. One of our favorite white teas from 2018 spring.

Pressed in 2018. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2018 Brown Sugar
description:
The 2018 Brown Sugar is made from a large percentage of huangpian [the largest leaf used in Puer production].

Every Brown Sugar blend we have pressed has been a bit different than the last and the 2018 is no exception. The 2018 batch was blended with the intention of being a light and comfortable daily drinking brick with a sweet core and woodier elements.

The soup is sweet and smooth, with a light and approachable character.

Each brick is 200 grams.

name: 2018 Carbolic Soap
description:
“Nobody needs to go anywhere else. We are all, if we only knew it, already there. If I only knew who in fact I am, I should cease to behave as what I think I am; and if I stopped behaving as what I think I am, I should know who I am. What in fact I am, if only the Manichee I think I am would allow me to know it, is the reconciliation of yes and no lived out in total acceptance and the blessed experience of Not-Two. In religion all words are dirty words. Anybody who gets eloquent about Buddha, or God, or Christ, ought to have his mouth washed out with carbolic soap.” - Aldous Huxley

Each cake is 200 grams.
The 2018 Carbolic Soap is a high quality Milan Dancong oolong that we really enjoyed and wanted to age for our own consumption. In order to justify the purchase we also decided to sell some of this limited pressing.

Medium fragrance, heavy body with an intense body feeling. The cake is pressed tightly for the long haul.

Pressed in 2018 using Milan Dancong oolong tea from Guangdong province in China. Each cake is 200g. Cakes are packed in bamboo tongs with five cakes per tong.

name: 2018 Bamboo Shu
description:
The 2018 Bamboo Shu ripe Puer Tea from white2tea was processed using a traditional technique of bamboo processing where the tea is pressed into fresh fragrant bamboo and hand roasted over an open flame before being dried for long term storage.

The Bamboo Shu blend has an entrancing aroma that balances the sweetness of our shou blend with the brighter fragrances of the bamboo. The tea is thick bodied and warming with a sweet character that will appeal to new ripe Puer drinkers and veteran Puer lovers alike. Drink immediately or age as you like.

Each purchase for a 200g piece will come enclosed in a bamboo shell similar to the one pictured, sizes and thicknesses will vary as one would expect with a plant.

name: 2018 Bamboo Peony
description:
This tea was produced in 2018 by hand roasting tea with a traditional technique of bamboo tea pressing.

The aromatics of the bamboo and the flame of the roast have mingled with the bright aromas of the fresh, bud heavy white tea to make a very unique experience. It has a complex interplay of fragrance, sweetness and smoothness.

This tea was roasted in the tips of the bamboo stalks, with 80 grams of tea per piece. Rather than break them up for a 25g sample, we will be selling them directly as a whole piece.

Each purchase is for 80 grams.

name: 2018 Arbor White
description:
Old arbor large leaf varietal tea that is usually destined to be made in raw Puer, picked and directly sun dried with no machine processing involved. We also have a black tea version of the same material.


Arbor white is deep and complex, thick tea with low tones and a subtle natural feel. This tea has a long development over the course of a session and can be a bit heavy. Not an ideal daily drinker, the Arbor white is better left for occasions where one can immerse themselves in this tea.

Pressed in 2018. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2018 Arbor Red
description:
Old arbor large leaf varietal tea that is usually destined to be made in raw Puer, picked and processed into dianhong style tea with sun drying. We also have a white tea version of the same material.


Arbor red is has an herbaceous fragrance and flavors that often border on medicinal. Sweetness underlies the complex flavors and heavy body of this tea. This is an enduring and heavy black tea best suited for a longer, gongfu style tea session.

Pressed in 2018. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2017 Year of the Rooster
description:
Our Year of the Rooster blend is a strong and forthright raw Puer. Menghai area character with a solid huigan [returning sweetness in the mouth] and layered fragrance.

Drink now if you favor bold raw Puer or age for a few years to round off the edges of this tea.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2017 Waffles
description:
Pressed in 2017.

An easily approachable character, pressed into a convenient waffle pattern that can be broken apart without the use of a tea needle. An excellent everyday ripe Puer tea, with a soft sweetness over a smooth body. A well balanced ripe Puer tea for beginners or veteran drinkers alike.

Each cake is 200 grams of tea.
The Waffles cake was pressed in 2017. 200g cakes, with 10 cakes in a paper tong.

name: 2017 U 2 CAN HELP
description:
The 2017 U 2 CAN HELP is a cake we made to help out Education In Sight, a non-profit organization that focuses on helping children in rural Yunnan get the eyeglasses and eye-care that they need.

For each raw Puer tea cake purchased, white2tea will donate one eye exam, a pair of glasses, and eye education to a child in need in rural Yunnan via Education in Sight. Our goal is to sell out 100 cakes and help out 100 kids in 2017. We really appreciate your support and it'd be amazing if you'd help spread the word!

The material of the tea cake is from Lincang, with a strong fragrance and thick mouth feel, this tea is sweet and floral. The loose tea from this cake was featured in the white2tea club in May of 2017. We are not selling samples of this tea, it's about the charity as much as the tea.

Even if you aren't into this tea cake, you can still donate to Education in Sight and get involved with their cause. Visit their website, or take a look at the information below to learn more about their mission.

Education In Sight is a non-profit organization whose vision is a China where every rural student has the eyeglasses they need to see clearly. Over 30 million students across rural China don't have the eyeglasses they need to see clearly in school. As a result, they suffer from significantly poorer academic performance, and much higher drop out rates. At Education In Sight, we work with local government and private partners to bring high quality eye exams and eye care directly to students inside the classroom, so they have no barriers to clear vision and can achieve life-long success.

To date, Education In Sight has coordinated over 150,000 eye exams, and delivered over 19,000 eyeglasses to students in Yunnan province. Their goal is to solve this problem for students both now and in the long-term, so that every rural student has the chance to see clearly and succeed.
The 2017 U 2 CAN HELP was pressed is a . Each cake is 200g. There are 5 cakes in each bamboo tongs and there are 100 cakes for sale via white2tea.

name: 2017 Turtle Dove
description:
The 2017 Turtle Dove is a pressed white tea from Yunnan. Made from large leaf varietal material, the tea is sun dried, with no machine processing involved. The tea has a thick body, soft mouthfeel, and a unique natural fragrance. This tea is very forgiving with any type of brewing, including gongfu, western, or grandpa style. A perfect tea to drink daily without much fuss.

Drink now or age for the long haul.

This tea has been tested and passed the test for 440 of the pesticides and herbicides on the EU MRL list.




Pressed in spring of 2017. Each brick is 200g. The bricks are in bamboo tongs, with five bricks per tong.

name: 2017 Tuhao af
description:
The 2017 tuhao as fuck is a blend of raw Puer material with character similar to Laobanzhang, without using any actual Laobanzhang material. Slightly heavier bitterness than in previous years, with a follow up of sweetness, the character is aggressive.

The tea itself is excellent quality despite not being “real” Laobanzhang. Aggressive in the first few years, this tea can benefit from some resting before drinking.

Pressed in spring of 2017. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2017 The Treachery of Story Telling Pt.1
description: Pressed in spring of 2017. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2017 Swinedog 76
description:
Swinedog 76 is a very potent tea. Strong bitterness and body feel with distinct character. It takes several steeps to gain momentum and then begins punishing everything and everyone foolish enough to get in its way.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2017 The Treachery of Story Telling Pt.2
description: Pressed in spring of 2017. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2017 Sunday Special
description:
We are very proud of this innovative ripe Puer blend. It combines several regions of Puer tea together with a partial mixture of our own small batch ripe Puer from last year. Silky mouthfeel and engaging sweetness with a unique fragrance. Best when enjoyed on Sunday.

Each cake is 200 grams of tea.

name: 2017 Sloppy Jimbo
description:
A medium bodied, easy drinking ripe Puer. Smooth texture with an emphasis on woody and earthy character over sweetness. Perfect as an everyday shou and/or brewed grandpa style in a big mug.

Each cake is 200 grams of tea.

name: 2017 She's Not Me
description:
The 2017 She's Not Me is mildly astringent in early steeps, followed by sweetness and a pleasant fragrance. A blend of several areas with an emphasis on Menghai character. This tea is great to drink right away or age for the long term.

Pressed in spring of 2017. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2017 Snoozefest
description:
Snoozefest is a limited edition blend of tea (only 100 cakes) that we would normally sell for over $40 per cake, however, we are selling it for $15 for each 200 gram cake ($75 per 1kg tong). 'Tis the season for hype, generosity and laughter.

No samples.

First come, first serve.

Drink now or age for the long haul.

All love.

;-)


Pressed in 2017. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2017 Pussy
description:
The 2017 Pussy is a sweet, heavy, and fragrance forward tea. This tea is great to drink right away or age for the long term.

Pressed in spring of 2017. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2017 Old Reliable
description: Our infamous house blend; a solid daily drinker ripe Puer tea that you can count on. An excellent combination of value and quality, the Old Reliable is a blend of several years of material, so despite being pressed in 2017, it is ready to drink now and will only continue to improve over the next few years. A smooth, sweet, thick ripe Puer tea with a classic Menghai character.

name: 2017 Poundcake
description:
The 2017 Poundcake, back by popular demand, our blend has an outlier Yiwu character. Strength with a very light young bitterness that is balanced out by soft sweetness. Good to drink young or stash away and age.

Pressed in spring of 2017. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2017 Nightlife
description:
Back by popular demand after 2016 sold out in a flash.

Nightlife is a bud heavy, high grade production of yueguangbai [moonlight white] style tea, commissioned from large leaf varietal material usually destined for raw Puer tea.

The tea has a heavy, creamy mouth feel with an airy sweetness and aroma.


Nightlife is a "yueguangbai" style Yunnan white tea. 200g cake pressed in 2017. Each bamboo tong contains 5 cakes.

name: 2017 Natural Redhead
description:
The 2017 Natural Redhead is a pressed black tea from Yunnan, made in the dianhong style. Made from large leaf varietal material, the tea is sun dried, with no machine processing involved. The tea is smooth, with a very thick body, and a soft natural fragrance.

Drink now or age a few years before drinking.

This tea has been tested and passed the test for 440 of the pesticides and herbicides on the EU MRL list.


Pressed in spring of 2017. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2017 Mini Jimbo
description:
Pressed in 2017.

A medium bodied, easy drinking ripe Puer. Smooth texture with an emphasis on woody and earthy character over sweetness. Perfect as an everyday shou and/or brewed grandpa style in a big mug.

The mini jimbos are roughly 8 grams each.
Pressed in 2017. Roughly 8g of tea per mini cake.

name: 2017 Manichee
description:
The 2017 Manichee has a distinct Yiwu character, soft and sweet with a calming, thick soup and direct sweetness. This tea is great to drink right away or age for the long term.

Pressed in spring of 2017. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2017 Magic Mountain DNA
description:
The 2017 Magic Mountain DNA is a blend with mixed characteristics of several areas, with a focus of the strength and aggressive feeling of Menghai. High quality tea for the near term or aging.


Pressed in spring of 2017. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2017 Little O
description:
Little O was pressed in 2017.

This blend of ripe Puer was pressed with aged orange peels, also called chenpi from Xinhui, in Guangdong province. The orange peels add an entrancing fragrance to the tea and will age with the tea. When steeping, the tea opens first with a smooth soup texture, with the orange peels contributing during mid to late steeps. The dynamic between the tea and the chenpi is engaging and soothing. An excellent drink for cold weather.

Each cake is 8 grams. The blend contains both ripe Puer tea and aged chenpi.
Pressed in 2017. Roughly 8g of tea per mini cake.

name: 2017 Lumber Slut
description:
If you dislike the idea of licking wood and rolling around on the damp forest floor, turn back now.

Lumber Slut is not the most approachable ripe Puer tea. Blended to favor the dense flavors of petrichor, this style of ripe Puer is focused on unfolding as a woody experience with notes of camphor and lower umber toned tastes. Will benefit from further aging, but if you're down for what this tea is offering, we suspect you can drink it straight away without flinching.

Each cake is 200 grams of tea.

name: 2017 IPA
description:
The 2017 IPA blend is inspired by hop heavy India Pale Ales. The tea has a strong, lingering bitterness with a bright fragrance on the top. A burly tea with an aggressive character. Good for a strong session.

Pressed in spring of 2017. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2017 Little Ducks
description:
Made from nearly identical material to our 2016 Diving Duck, this tea has a sharp Yiwu character. The tea is youthful and strong. When brewed lightly it is floral and sweet, when brewed with a heavy hand it is syrupy sweet and has a bite.

Each mini cake is roughly 8 grams, each purchase is for one mini cake.
Roughly 8 gram mini cakes of raw Puer tea.

name: 2017 Happy Anniversary, Baby
description:
This is a blend commemorating the five year anniversary of your beloved white2tea. We wouldn't dare make a cake like this half-assed.

This cake is in storage for future anniversaries.


Pressed in spring of 2017. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2017 Grandpa's
description:
Grandpa's was hand pressed in 2017.

Named after the term coined by blogger Marshaln - our Grandpa's ripe Puer tea is an 8 gram ball that is meant to be tossed into a cup, mug, or thermos and brewed with very little attention. Just add boiling water and enjoy. The Grandpa's has a smooth body and a classic Menghai character.
The Grandpa's tea ball was hand pressed in 2017. Roughly 8g of tea per ball.

name: 2017 Flap Jacks - Ripe Puer
description:
Flap Jacks ripe was pressed in 2017. Each flap jack is roughly 8 grams, with 7 flapjacks in each short stack.

This blend of ripe Puer is suitable for any style of brewing. It has a sweet flavor and inviting fragrance that make it a solid daily drinker for new and veteran Puer drinkers alike. Soothing and smooth, a lovely ripe blend. The easy to steep shape makes it an ideal tea to grab on the go.

Price is per shortstack.
Pressed in 2017 with ripe Puer. Roughly 8g of tea per flapjack. Each short stack has 7 flapjacks.

name: 2017 four am
description:
The 2017 four am is a blend of multiple areas. The tea is both elegant and heavy at the same time, with a complex character. Drink now or age for the long term.

Pressed in spring of 2017. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2017 fuck what u heard
description:
The 2017 fuck what u heard is thick and strong with a heavy body feel. A blend of several areas, using very high quality material. This tea is good to drink right away or age for the long term.

Pressed in spring of 2017. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2017 Flap Jacks - Raw Puer
description:
Flap Jacks raw was pressed in 2017. Each flap jack is roughly 8 grams, with 7 flapjacks in each short stack.

Conveniently pressed into an easy single steep shape, the tea is still young and astringent as one would expect from a fresh raw Puer tea. The tea has a punchy fresh fragrance and sweetness. Don't let the cute shape fool you, this tea is just as engaging as its larger counterparts.

Price is per shortstack.
Pressed in 2017 with raw Puer. Roughly 8g of tea per flapjack. Each short stack has 7 flapjacks.

name: 2017 Daily Drinker
description:
Our house blend raw Puer tea, the 2017 Daily Drinker is a sweet, fragrance forward tea. Solid, reliable, affordable, and better quality than the most teas in its price range. Everyday tea for life.

Pressed in spring of 2017. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2017 Dangerous Messengers
description:
The 2017 Dangerous Messengers is a blend of Menghai area tea, aggressive and sweet with a touch of bite. This tea is calm enough to drink right away, but might be too strong for some to drink immediately. Quality tea built to age for the long term.

Pressed in spring of 2017. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2017 Farmer Direct Tea
description:
The 2017 Farmer Direct Tea (FDT) is a blend of several areas, with an emphasis on Menghai area character. Fast, lingering sweetness in the mouth and a sticky mouth texture. This tea is perfect to drink right away or age for the long haul.

Pressed in spring of 2017. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2017 Boat Captain
description:
You've been at sea for weeks and you're bone-tired. The tattered sails need repairs and your crew is working frantically to mend them; storm clouds loom on the horizon. They are fatigued from a full day's labor. Murmurs and complaints linger on the breeze. The faint stench of mutiny. Your mates grow weary, wondering if they'll ever see port again. Lily-livered bastards. Is it the weeks of subsisting on mussels and whale meat? Straw mat beds and the churning waters that ceaselessly toy with our vessel? No matter. This is what they signed up for and you've got bigger fish to fry. The crew continues sewing the sails as you plot the next move. Your throat is raw from barking orders. The briny sea air and your pipe tobacco haven't helped a bit.

Your first mate pokes his head through the door, "Your tea is ready, Captain."

Each mini cake is 8 grams, each purchase is for one mini cake.
Roughly 8 gram mini cakes of raw Puer tea.

You still want tasting notes? Is that why you're down here?

Not cool, cap'n.

This is a harsh, bully of a tea. Smoke & pipe tobacco, with an aggressive, punchy power that leaves a wake of sweetness. A burly, heavy hitter. Will definitely benefit from aging, but if you're into the style, drinking it now is no mistake.

name: 2017 Big O
description:
This blend of ripe Puer was pressed with aged orange peels, also called chenpi from Xinhui, in Guangdong province. The orange peels add an entrancing fragrance to the tea and will age with the tea over time. When steeping, the tea opens first with a smooth soup texture, with the orange peels contributing more during mid to late steeps. The dynamic between the tea and the chenpi is engaging and soothing. An excellent drink for cold weather, nothing warms you up quite like a Big O.

Each cake is 200 grams. The blend contains both ripe Puer tea and aged chenpi.

name: 2017 Bellwether
description:
The 2017 Bellwether is a blend with distinct Yiwu character. Sweet, smooth, soft, and subtly strong. Drink now or age for the next seven decades (or as desired).


Pressed in spring of 2017. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with five cakes per tong.

name: 2017 Big Green Hype
description:
The 2017 Big Green Hype has a lovely fragrance and youthful strength. An excellent tea to drink on the daily, with plenty of depth and endurance for an entry level tea.

Drink now or age for the long haul.

This tea has been tested and passed the test for 440 of the pesticides and herbicides on the EU MRL list.

Pressed in spring of 2017. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are in bamboo tongs, with eight cakes per tong.

name: 2016 We Go High
description:
A blend of raw Puer material with a diverse profile. Sweet and soft, elegant soup. Weighty flavors appear in later steeps with a soft entry. Pressed tightly for the long haul, but very drinkable now.

Each cake is 200 grams.
200g Raw Puer cake pressed in 2016. Each bamboo tong contains 5 cakes.

name: 2017 Mengsong Old Arbor
description:
Autumn raw Puer maocha [loose tea] from old arbor trees in a single grove in the Mengsong mountain range. The tea is bright and mildly astringent, with a lasting sweetness and the floral characteristics of youth. Drink now or age as you please.

Each package is for 50 grams of loose tea.

name: 2016 Tyler
description:
A blend of raw Puer material that focuses on the light, airy, and sweet. A good transition point between to experience tea with more depth that is not too heavy. Some residual bitterness and astringency will fade with age.

Each cake is 200 grams. The wrapper for this cake was a collaboration between white2tea and artist Joe Librandi-Cowan.
200g Raw Puer cake pressed in 2016. Each bamboo tong contains 5 cakes. The wrapper for this cake was a collaboration between white2tea and artist Joe Librandi-Cowan.

name: 2016 Untitled 02
description:
A blend of raw Puer material with low underlying bitterness. The soup is thick and heavy with strong sweetness and body feel.

Each cake is 200 grams.
200g Raw Puer cake pressed in 2016. Each bamboo tong contains 5 cakes.

name: 2016 Tuhao as F*ck
description:
A blend of raw Puer material with character similar to Laobanzhang, without using any actual Laobanzhang material. Though Laobanzhang character is not a singular thing, and can mean literally hundreds of different things, we opted for a tea with a lighter bitterness and more sweetness and internal strength.

The tea itself is excellent quality. Despite not being “real” Laobanzhang, it is real tea.

Each cake is 200 grams.
200g Raw Puer cake pressed in 2016. Each bamboo tong contains 5 cakes.

name: 2016 Trap Bird
description:
A fragrance forward tea with a heavy amount of buds and small leaves. The intense aromas of the tea are bolstered by a base of softer medium sized leaf to keep the tea engaging late in the session. Great for everyday ripe Puer on the lighter side.


The Trap Bird cake was pressed in 2016. 200g cakes, with 5 cakes in a bamboo tong.

name: 2016 The Treachery of Storytelling Pt.2
description:
A blend of raw Puer material.

Each cake is 200 grams.
200g Raw Puer cake pressed in 2016. Each bamboo tong contains 5 cakes.

name: 2016 teadontlie
description:
A blend of raw Puer material that has a sweet, thick body. A heavy interior fruity floral fragrance and a strong astringency that will calm down with age.

Each cake is 200 grams.
200g Raw Puer cake pressed in 2016. Each bamboo tong contains 5 cakes.

name: 2016 Sister Brother
description:
Free Shipping anywhere on Earth, coupon code: basics

The Sister Brother set is a comparison sample set that illustrates the difference in processing styles that can exist between two different people, in this case a sister and brother.

The material in the bricks is identical Nannuo mountain material, but each brick was commissioned to be processed by only one person. The sister brick is material processed with a shorter kill green phase at a lower temperature, where as the brother brick is processed with a higher flame and fried for a longer time. These are their natural processing styles as people, I simply told them to process the tea as they normally would and to keep their respective materials separate for pressing.

This set is best used in a side by side comparison to see how the person processing a tea can influence the end results of identical material. It should shed light on how much variation can truly occur, not only within a "single origin" tea, but even within a family using identical material from a single tea garden.

Each set is 200 grams of raw Puer tea, comprised of two 100g bricks. Though this is an educational set, the tea is pretty damn nice - learning should be fun.
The Sister Brother set includes two separate 100g Raw Puer bricks pressed in 2016. Each set totals 200g of tea.

name: 2016 Prolaxicorvatin
description:
A classic style Menghai brawler of a tea. A backdrop of smoke with strong character and an imposing body. Burly daily drinker for the present, or calm it down for a couple years to soften the rough edges.

Each cake is 200 grams.
200g Raw Puer cake pressed in 2016. Each bamboo tong contains 5 cakes.

name: 2016 Poundcake
description:
A blend of raw Puer material with an outlier Yiwu character. The Poundcake has strength, medium light bitterness, and sweetness. A good fit for both new and experienced Puer drinkers.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2016 post truth
description:
The 2016 post truth is an iron cake with very tight compression.

The material of post truth is fragrance forward, with an engaging aroma and a sweet backbone. This tea is great to drink right away or age for the long haul.


The 2016 post truth is an 'iron cake' pressed with very tight compression. Each cake is 200g. The cakes are not in bamboo tongs.

name: 2016 Old Whitey
description:
This tea is a feature in the 2016 September tea club.

The Old Whitey was a special commission for white2tea using large leaf Puer varietal (camellia sinensis assamica), processed as white tea in a similar fashion to Fujian shoumei, that was fully sun dried with no air tunnel drying. The results are a unique and natural tea suitable for drinking now or for further aging. The body of the tea is intensely thick and smooth, with a distinct sweetness and floral scent.

Each cake is 100 grams.

name: 2016 Last Thoughts
description:
A blend of raw Puer material from Yiwu region. When we first made this blend in 2014, we wrote "This tier of tea rarely sees the light of day in the open market," and we sincerely mean that. Not a blend we would recommend for beginners. The traits that make this tea special are often not apparent to most new Puer drinkers.

We will not be making this exact blend next year.

Each cake is 357 grams. The per gram price and cake price of this tea are identical to facilitate people buying less than a full cake with no mark up.

name: 2016 Nightlife
description:
Nightlife is a bud heavy, high grade production of yueguangbai [moonlight white] style Puer tea, commissioned from large leaf varietal material usually destined for raw Puer tea.

The tea has a heavy, creamy mouth feel with an airy sweetness and aroma.


Nightlife is a "yueguangbai" style Yunnan white tea. 200g cake pressed in 2016. Each bamboo tong contains 5 cakes.

name: 2016 Hot Brandy
description:
A blend of both white and black tea, Hot Brandy is a completely new style of cake that was born of experimentation. The soup is thick, smooth, and fragrant. It fairs well with both gongfu style and western style brewing. The tea has excellent endurance and can steep for a very long time and can even withstand being simmered or boiled without becoming acrid.

Both the white tea and black tea have been sun dried and should age well together. However, this cake is the first of its kind; how it will age is anybody's guess.


Hot Brandy is a mix of both white tea and black tea. 200g cake pressed in 2016. Each bamboo tong contains 5 cakes.

name: 2016 Into the Mystic
description:
A blend of raw Puer material and by far the most "out there" blend of the 2016 spring. Unique character and fragrance unlike anything else in this year's productions. Thick, sweet, and heavy.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2016 Head
description:
A blend of raw Puer material with thick rich soup and a long lasting huigan [sweetness in the mouth]. Young astringency and bitterness are both front and center on entry. This tea will continue to get thicker as it calms down from pressing.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2016 Heart of the City
description:
A blend of raw Puer material. Sweet and thick. Flavors of dense fruits and heavier than average astringency. Strong fragrance that will continue to tighten up as the cake ages in the next several years.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2016 Diving Duck
description:
A blend of raw Puer material with Yiwu character. There is still a slight youthful bite, but the tea focuses on sweetness and soft character.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2016 ChocoBrick White Tea
description:
The 2016 ChocoBar White Tea is a 100g brick, with a shape that is easily breakable for convenient brewing.

The brick is made of a blend of Yunnan large leaf varietal white tea that was sun dried. It can be aged or brewed immediately. The soup is soft and thick, with floral aromas and a creamy mouth feel.

name: 2016 Fade
description:
The Fade brick is a raw Puer tea, pressed in 2016 using 2015 Yiwu Huangpian [the largest leaf in Puer processing] material.

While huangpian are often considered to be inexpensive, the quality of the material in this blend is very high. The tea is sweet and thick. There is a slight sour note in the tea which will give way to honey and smoothness with further aging. We also feel this tea has a strong body feeling, though that varies from person to person.

Suitable to drink now or age for the long haul. There are 5 bricks per 1 kilogram tong.

name: 2016 Cream
description:
A thick, yet balanced ripe Puer with heavy soup and an engaging fragrance. Menghai style character shows through strongly, even though this is a fairly fresh cake. Drink now or age for the future.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2016 Daily Drinker
description:
A blend of raw Puer material meant for the daily grind. Sweetness and a delightful fragrance. Solid, reliable, affordable, and better quality than you'd expect for the price. Tea for the everyday. Tea for the people.

Each cake is 200 grams.

name: 2016 ChocoBrick Ripe Puer
description:
The 2016 ChocoBar Ripe Puer is a 100g brick, with a shape that is easily breakable for convenient brewing.

The brick is a blend of daily drinker ripe Puer. Smooth and rich tea for no fuss tea brewing on the go, at the office, or at home.
The ChocoBrick is a 100g brick pressed into an easily breakable chocolate bar shape. Pressed in 2016. Each brick comes wrapped in paper with a cardboard box.

name: 2016 ChocoBrick Raw Puer
description:
The 2016 ChocoBar Raw Puer is a 100g brick, with a shape that is easily breakable for convenient brewing.

The brick is raw Puer tea that can be aged or brewed immediately. This ChocoBar raw is a sweet and fragrant tea suitable for daily drinking on the go.
The ChocoBrick is a 100g brick pressed into an easily breakable chocolate bar shape. Pressed in 2016. Each brick comes wrapped in paper with a cardboard box.

name: 2016 ChocoBrick Black Tea
description:
The 2016 ChocoBar Black Tea is a 100g brick, with a shape that is easily breakable for convenient brewing.

The brick is made of a blend of Yunnan large leaf varietal black tea that was sun dried. It can be aged or brewed immediately. This tea has an airy fragrance, with fruity notes and a smooth texture.
The ChocoBrick is a 100g brick pressed into an easily breakable chocolate bar shape. Pressed in 2016. Each brick comes wrapped in paper with a cardboard box.

name: 2016 Censers
description:
A 2016 white tea from Guizhou province, which was aged in Guizhou and pressed into cakes spring 2019.*


This tea exhibits aged qualities; dark smoothness and a sweet base with medicinal aromas. The 2016 Censers has a complex fragrance that endures throughout a long session, lingering in the mouth and the cups long after the tea has gone. The fragrances and flavors shift between dark stone fruits and herbal medicines from steep to steep. This tea has a remarkably different character depending on brewing parameters. Lighter weight and fast steep times emphasize the sweetness, whereas a heavy hand brings out the thick bodied dark flavors.


Each cake is 200g.


The dates on the original boxes was actually 2013, but the producer said to the best of his recollection it was in fact from spring 2016, so we went with the later date. The true age is anybody's guess, but it was pressed with age on it.

name: 2016 Bosch
description:
Back by popular demand, a blend of raw Puer material from multiple areas. Strong body feel. Not the best place to start for inexperienced Puer tea drinkers.

Each cake is 200 grams.
200g Raw Puer cake pressed in 2016. Each bamboo tong contains 5 cakes.

name: 2016 Brown Sugar
description:
The 2016 Brown Sugar is made from a large percentage of huangpian [the largest leaf used in Puer production]. The soup is sweet and smooth, with a light and approachable character. The blend has a larger percentage of smaller leaf material than the 2015 blend, as well as the incorporation of several regions.

Each brick is 200 grams.

name: 2016 A&P
description:
This tea was a feature in the 2016 July tea club.

The A&P is a pressed black tea, suitable for aging in the short term. Intentionally processed on the lighter side with traditional sun drying, this black tea has deeper chocolate flavors. This tea was a special commission for white2tea using large leaf Puer varietal.

Each cake is 100 grams.

name: 2015 Tuhao as #$&%
description:
2015 Tuhao Raw Puer Tea from White2tea.

This tea is our attempt at blending a tea with character similar to Laobanzhang, without using any actual Laobanzhang material. Though Laobanzhang character is not a singular thing, and can mean literally hundreds of different things, we opted for a tea with a lighter bitterness and more sweetness and internal strength.

The cake is a commentary on the focus on brand name, fame, and authenticity. The tea itself is excellent quality. Despite not being "real" Laobanzhang, it is real tea.
Pressed in 2015 by stone. 200g cakes, with 5 cakes in a bamboo tong.

What does 土豪 [Tuhao] mean? Tuhao are the newly wealthy class of China, known for a lack of taste ( gaudy fashion sense, gold, jaguar print, etc.) and buying what is expensive, rather than what is good. 2 Hao [好］is a pinyin/english pun, meaning "too good".

name: 2015 Smooch
description:
Made from quality Lincang material, the tea Smooch is convenient for on-the-go tea brewing or travel situations where carrying a cake is not an option. The Smooch brews up sweet and easy to drink, with a charming fragrance.

Each sample is in a hand rolled ball shape of roughly 8 grams, though each sample varies slightly by weight.
Roughly 8 gram balls made from Lincang material and wrapped in paper

name: 2015 Red Star
description:
2015 Red Star is made with blended aged ripe Puer material and a fresh 2015 Xinhui Mandarin.

The tea is meant to be drunk with the orange skin. Simply break off a few small pieces (roughly an 8:1 tea to skin ratio) and steep together. The red star is quite fresh and has a heavy fruity, citrus fragrance. For those interested in a more aged, medicinal taste, purchase this tea now in order to age it or check out the Black Star.

Most of the cost of this tea is due to the high price of both the handmade labor and the prized skins of Xinhui Mandarins, which cost much more than most Puer tea by weight. If you are interested in better value for tea weight, check out our other Ripe Puer Teas.

Each purchase is for one Red Star Mandarin.
Ripe Puer tea stuffed inside of a dried Xinhui Mandarin. The amount of tea varies by weight according to the size of the Mandarin, the total weight is roughly 35 grams. Most of the cost of this tea is due to the high price of both the handmade labor and the prized skins of Xinhui Mandarins. If you are interested in better value per tea weight, check out our other Ripe Puer Teas.

This tea is labeled as 2015 because the Mandarin is from 2015. The tea is blended from several years of older material in order to offer a taste that matches the rind. Each Mandarin is wrapped in paper and sealed in plastic. We recommend storing them this way until you are ready to drink them.

name: 2015 Red Shroom - Ripe Puer Tea
description:
Ripe Puer Tea from White2tea, made using 2014 Ripe material, and pressed in 2015.

This tea has a Menghai character. The soup is smooth and sweet, with plenty of complexity. The material was rested for a full year prior to pressing and is ready to drink now or store for the long term. An excellent ripe Puer blend for beginners and veterans alike.

We recommend using a tea pick to break it apart. Take your time and be careful.

name: 2015 Pretty Girls - Ripe Puer
description:
The 2015 Pretty Girls Ripe Puer Tea from White2tea is our best blended shu.

The blend is a combination of high quality Menghai area material from the previous several years, pressed in 2015. Depth, sweetness, and fragrance are beginning to emerge from this tea, which rested in Menghai post pressing. An excellent tea to drink right now or store for the long term.
The Pretty Girls cake was machine pressed in 2015. 200g cakes, with 5 cakes in a bamboo tong.

name: 2015 Poundcake
description:
2015 Poundcake Raw Puer Tea from White2tea.

The Poundcake tea has strength, medium light bitterness, and sweetness. The soup brews a gold color and has character that could be described as "outlier Yiwu". An excellent cake for new Puer drinkers and Puer drinkers with experience alike.
We pressed the Poundcake in 2015 by stone. 200g cakes, with 5 cakes in a bamboo tong.

name: 2015 Pin
description:
2015 Pin Raw Puer Tea from White2tea.

The Pin is a blend of three years of high quality material (2013, 2014, and 2015) with Lincang character. The tea has a sweet flavor and a heavy fragrance. The texture of the soup is much smoother than our other 2015 productions due to the blended material from previous years, which was stored in Menghai prior to pressing. An excellent tea to drink now or save to drink several years down the line.


The Pin cake was pressed in 2015, using material from 2013, 2014, and 2015. 200g cakes, with 8 cakes in a bamboo tong.

name: 2015 Old Reliable - Ripe Puer House Blend
description:
The 2015 Old Reliable Ripe Puer Tea is White2tea's house blend.

The name says it all, a solid daily drinker ripe Puer tea that you can count on. An excellent combination of value and quality, the Old Reliable is a blend of several years of material, so despite being pressed in 2015, it is ready to drink now and will only continue to improve over the next few years. A smooth, sweet, thick ripe Puer tea with a classic Menghai character.

The Old Reliable is one of the features of the January 2016 Tea Club shipment.
The Old Reliable cake was machine pressed in 2015. 200g cakes, with 5 cakes in a bamboo tong.

name: 2015 MC&A
description:
2015 Milk, Cream, & Alcohol Raw Puer Tea from White2tea

Menghai area character. Built to be a quality daily drinker. A blend that has all of the traits of a classic style raw Puer tea, at a price that anyone can afford. Drink now or store for the long haul.


Milk, Cream, & Alcohol was machine pressed in 2015. 200g cakes, with 8 cakes in a bamboo tong.

name: 2015 Little Walk
description:
2015 Little Walk from White2tea.

Menghai area character that tends towards the sweet and fragrant. Mellow character and an easy daily drinking tea.

The Little Walk is also a friendly introduction tea for new Puer drinkers who afraid of heavy bitterness and astringency, but want to experience raw Puer.
The Little Walk was machine pressed in 2015. 200g cakes, with 8 cakes in a bamboo tong.

name: 2015 Last Thoughts
description:
2015 Last Thoughts Raw Puer Tea from White2tea.

A tea made with high quality material that took no small effort to acquire. This tea has the character of Yiwu and is elegant, and deceptively powerful. As we mentioned with our 2014 Last Thoughts, this is a tier of tea that rarely sees the open market, much less the Western market. An enduring tea that we hope you get the opportunity to try.
The Last Thoughts Puer tea cake was pressed in 2015 by stone. 357g cakes, with 7 cakes in a bamboo tong.

name: 2015 If You're Reading This It's 2 Late.
description:
2015 If You're Reading This It's 2 Late. Raw Puer Tea from White2tea

This best combination of quality and value of any tea we produced in 2015. High quality material from a pristine natural environment with quality processing. The tea is robust, complex, thick, smooth, and sweet with a long lasting huigan [sweet aftertaste]. We encourage you to judge the character, quality, and traits of this tea yourself.
The If You're Reading This It's 2 Late. cake was machine pressed in 2015. 200g cakes, with 8 cakes in a bamboo tong.

name: 2015 Gongmei
description:
Stored in dry/natural conditions in Fujian until pressing in 2018, this baicha [white tea] from Fuding county in Fujian province is considered to be Gongmei grade white tea, which has more buds and higher grade leaf than a Shoumei.

The thick body of this tea has a heavy sweetness and beautiful array of fragrances, with a slightly youthful crispness when pushed. This tea is very versatile and suitable for further aging or drinking directly.

Each cake is 360 grams.

name: 2015 Colbert Holland 1945
description:
2015 Colbert Holland, 1945 Raw Puer Tea from White2tea

Made with tea that has unique Menghai character, this tea has a very thick mouth feel and viscous soup. The sweet aftertaste is strong and pleasant. High quality base material and an excellent quality tea to drink now or store for the future.
Pressed in 2015 by stone. 200g cakes, with 5 cakes in a bamboo tong.

name: 2015 Green Shroom
description:
Originally pressed as a tea for our White2tea Tea Club.

2015 Green Shroom Raw Puer Tea from White2tea.

Pressed into a traditional jincha [mushroom shape], the tea is from Menghai area and has a strong and sweet, floral character, which is direct and fragrant. The tight pressing should preserve this fragrance well as it ages.

Due to limited stock, no samples are available.
Pressed in 2015, 250g mushroom shaped pressing. This tea is tightly pressed. We recommend using a tea pick to break it apart. As always, take your time and be careful!

name: 2015 Channel Orange
description:
Channel Orange was pressed in 2015 into a chocolate bar shape.

The brick is a mixed of a white2tea Puer blend and a mix of 3-8 years old Xinhui Chenpi, the dried skins of mandarin oranges. The result is a thick and fragrant natural melding of fruit flavors and the characteristic smooth body of ripe Puer. We find this to be a soothing tea that is great for cool weather or rainy days.

name: 2015 Brown Sugar
description:
Ripe Puer Tea from White2tea, made using 2012 material, pressed in 2015.

This tea is made from a pile fermented exclusively with top tier huangpian [the largest leaf used in Puer production]. The Brown Sugar brick has Menghai character. The soup is sweet and smooth. It was rested for over two years prior to pressing and is ready to drink now or store for the long term. The material used is of uncommonly high quality. Later steeps are light in color, with a sweet and soft profile.

The fermentation level of this tea was around 65%, which is considered light. Some leaves may even be slightly greenish, and will continue to become darker with further aging.
The Brown Sugar brick was pressed in 2015 using 2012 ripe Puer huangpian [large leaf] material, which underwent shu Puer processing in 2o13. 250g brick shape pressing. Sorry Mom, for the casual swearing.

The soup of this tea might be slightly cloudy, due to its recent pressing. It will become increasingly clear with time.

name: 2015 Anhua Tianjian
description:
Anhua heicha, also known as dark tea, a post fermented tea from Hunan province in China.

Tianjian is a high grade production of Anhua heicha that contains younger leaves and buds. These baskets were stored in the mountains in Anhua for six years prior to moving to our Guangzhou storage. Their mountains storage is on the humid side, but will return to a more dry state with time.

The age on this tea has smoothed out of the corners of youth and it is well on its way to being a smooth, aged heicha. Spicy aroma with hints of age creeping into a smooth and sweet soup. Excellent daily tea for tianjian lovers.  

Baskets contain ~1000g of loosely pressed tea.

name: 2015 72Hours
description:
2015 72Hours from White2tea.

Our highest quality and most complex blend from 2015. A tea worthy of aging, but a joy to drink for lovers of young raw Puer tea. The 72Hours blend is intensely sweet and has a variety of engaging characteristics. We recommend this as a tea for special occasions or focused brewing.

The material in this blend crosses many regions and mountains, but all of the material used is of excellent quality. We have been studying this blend of material for several years and after short term aging (~5 years) the soup becomes increasingly viscous and sweet, with an intense body feel.
The 72Hours was stone pressed by hand on June 16th,2015 at Hexing Tea Factory, one of the highest quality hand pressing operations in all of Yunnan. 200g cakes, with 5 cakes per tong.
